name: Beverly Stephens
text: Ary Body Shop is courteous,  professional and did great work. I had my head light covers cleaned and it made a world of difference. I had the door lock mechanism worked on. Charles explained everything to me where I could understand. Price are very reasonable. I will use them again!!

name: Kelly Morris
text: We’ve been bringing our vehicles to Charles for years. Everything from small dents/chips to car vs. tree—he’s fixed it all. He’s even done some out-of-the-box stuff for us that has really improved our driving experience. I trust his judgement and his estimates are always super close (if not spot on). The guys at Ary’s are honest and hard working and as much as I hate having my car fixed, they make the process so much easier.

name: Corey Biggs
text: Took my ‘14 Honda Accord in for some damage to my hood. Hood was bent and folded back with the paint chipped. It only took him one day to repair it and it is absolutely flawless! Literally can’t even tell where it happened, like brand new! Great work, great service!

name: Missy Fantusi
text: Mr. Ary repaired my uncle's car where it had been dented on the side, and did a fantastic, top notched job. I would recommend Mr. Ary for car repairs, and dent jobs. Kudos!!

resp.text: Thank you for your business

resp.text: Thank you for your business

name: Chris Ritter Jr
text:
They repaired my older Acura TL after getting T-boned. I was a little worried that the car would never be the same again after being hit but I was wrong! They had my car fixed up better than it has ever been and even took care of a few small unrelated items on the car for next to nothing. They always kept me in the loop as to what was going on with the repair and how much longer they thought it would be. They were always pleasant on the phone unlike a lot of other shops that act annoyed when call for a status update.

I’m still blown away with the quality of work and level of professionalism that Cheek Auto is able to provide.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We hope you don’t need us again for a while! If you do, well you’ve got the number.

name: Resa T
text: They did an awesome job repairing my SUV and they even detailed the outside of it when they were finished!!  Jonathan is excellent communicating with you about the process and the turn around time for repair is very short. Great place!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We hope you don’t need us again, but if you do give us a call!

name: trey roper
text: I had a really good experience using Cheeks. The price was less than many of the places that I called. The people were also very friendly. They got the work done in time and kept me informed if they had any delays.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind works. We appreciate your business!

name: Bridgette Morrow
text: I got a nissan altima from here and I absolutely love it. They was up front and worked with me! Great service and wonderful people! I highly recommend them!!

name: Pam Cason
text: I highly recommend Cheek Auto for any and all body work needs. Fabulous work every time!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Cason! Please tell your husband to look both ways by the deer crossings from now on. ;)

name: Ryan Coffel
text: Dude, this guy rules. On time, under budget, better work, personable, went above and beyond, picked up from my occupation. You pickin’ up what I’m throwin’ down? Dude’s a pro. Does not mount or balance tires.

text: Very polite over the phone and helpful.

name: Mike Goins
text: Good service

name: Kim Davenport
text: We have known the owner personally for years. If you want a good job done on your vehicle, no matter what the job is, we highly recommend this business!!

name: Lisa Ellis
text: Unfortunately, I've had to bring my car here a few times because of damage here and there.  Everyone here is kind, personable, and professional. They go out of their way to help you. My car has always been ready when they said it would be, looking new and freshly washed. I hope to not need repair again, but if I do, Leatherwood is the only place I'll go.

name: Daniel Gillens
text: Fast and courteous service.  Paul Stamp and his staff did a great job repairing my car, and a very good price.

name: Jessica Holder
text: The best around!  Mr. Paul and his staff are amazing!

name: kristy saldivar
text: Leatherwood and Sons took their time with the vehicle making sure the work was done correctly before returning the vehicle to my in laws from out of state. I had previously reviewed that there was poor communication, but I believe that had a lot to do with three different family members not communicating with each other. The owner/manager of the shop came down on a Saturday and opened up for my father in law to pick up the vehicle. Not many businesses would have done that for someone, especially an out of town stranger. When a friend and long time resident of Phenix City found out the car was at Leatherwood's, they said it could not be at any better place. I would recommend that you take your vehicle to them.

name: Clint Fonder
text: Great group of people fantastic workmen ship.

text: Did want to help me with my vehicle at all because someone hit me that had geico insurance.

text: Wouldn't use anyone else

text: Great service

name: Bud der
text: Great work!

name: Aleem Gillani
text: A genuinely helpful business with knowledgeable and friendly people. They did a great job on my car at a good price and returned my clean car to me on the day originally promised. Wes appears to be well known as an honest businessman and I will definitely use them again if necessary.

name: Mickey Deason
text: I would highly recommend Lake Martin Paint and Body to anyone looking for a top notch business. Wes and his staff done a great job on my truck after a deer destroyed my front end. They were very efficient, reasonable pricing in a timely matter. Their work looks good Check them out!

name: Christy Harrison
text: Wesley is an excellent mechanic and great at car body work - always fair and very knowledgeable.

name: Patrick Dickson
text: Very slow business. Unless you want to drive a rental for months, don’t go here. They have had my friend’s car now for 64 days and counting. At no point along the way have I gotten a phone call about the status. I have had to call every time. Every deadline I have been given has been surpassed. Not a reliable company and poor communication.

name: Sir Consumer
text: Joe Hudson's Birmingham location is not recommended. My car was taken there due to Gardendales location not accepting new customers as of late June.  It would have been October before Gardendales branch could help.  I had decided to release my car to the insurance company thus I needed to remove any personal belongings. I showed up and discovered that my car was parked in a poorly fenced in lot. The car had been ransacked and the stereo and other items were stolen. The receptionist informed me they have been having theft issues and apologized. The trunk was left open and it was flooded from past rain. Joe Hudson provided zero coverage while in their possession. Poor fencing and knowledge that theft was an issue but continue to leave vehicles in this lot. Do not trust your vehicle will be taken care of unless it is written in an agreement and you are assured it will be protected. The emotional insult can not be repaired. Such a large company and this location will not build a secure storage shelter for vehicles. Knowing theft is ramped.

resp.text: Could you please give us your name that we have on file? We, at corporate, would like to pull your information and look into this so we can take care of your issues. Thank you.

name: LaShundra Brown
text: Wish I had read the reviews first. They promised me my vehicle back in 2 weeks and it took 8 weeks. They lost my remote and car keys.  Suddenly after receiving my vehicle back there's a Crack in the radiator.  I wouldn't recommend them to anyone.  To hell with this company

name: Carrie Gargis
text: I had the best experience with Joe Hudson. They were extremely professional and kept me informed on the status on my car. When I picked my car up, they had cleaned the inside and the outside. It looks like a brand new car. They were so nice and polite.  I would definitely recommend them!!

name: Heath Anderson
text: This was my second experience with Joe Hudson. They were very communicative through the entire process, and completed the work swiftly. Quality work and would definitely use them again!

name: Angela Hollis
text: Nice group of guys in the body shop, they offered me assistance when I was there. The occasion wasn't a pleasant one because I was retrieving belongings from my totaled vehicle. I had to say my last good- byes.😟😟😟

name: Leslie Holifield
text: Professional  efficient and upfront about costs and labor hours.  I was kept up to date on the process of body work and given a lifetime warranty.

name: Keywana Allen
text: Amazing work and service; they did more than expected!

name: Rachel Dent
text: They were simply backed up and I didn't choose them

name: Karaleighs Music
text: Very courteous staff, excellent service.

name: Eric Williams
text: My car was hit by another driver and the rear bumper was in bad shape. I took it in for repairs and all was done the next day. My car looks brand new again. Staff was amazing. I don't usually leave reviews but I had to do it this time. I definitely recommend this shop.

name: Frank Phillips
text: Great work and great service.

name: Chelsea Symone
text: I was in a car accident and was referred to use Joe Hudson’s collision center for repairs. Overall I had a excellent experience. Nice work and car looked as if it was brand new at pickup.

name: Connieconell McClure
text: They were courteous.  Contacted my rental company for an almost no waiting experience.

name: Danny Threatt
text: I will tell other people how good your service is

name: Reid Thompson
text: Even though we got off to a rocky start because it took a month to schedule an appointment to get my car repaired, the overall experience was awesome. They fixed my car in TWO days, and Darren and Josh went above and beyond. Not only did my car look great, the repair and a wash, but they put air in one of my tires and got rid of that pesky check engine light. Great customer service all around.

name: Donna Howlett
text: Anytime I've needed body work,  I've always depended on Joe Hudson.  They do excellent,  professional work and deliver your vehicle timely.

name: Barry Coleman
text: Amazing staff, always helpful and willing to help customers my personal favorite joe Hudson in the Birmingham area!!

name: Clev Jordan
text: Worst experience in my life, horrible communication skills by the owners.

resp.text: We do hate to read that you feel so unhappy with the experience you had with our shop. Please call the manager of the location and speak to them concerning your experience. If you would like you can also email me directly at joehudsoncollision@gmail.com. We would like the opportunity to understand your frustrations. Understanding would allow us to correct anything that may need correcting.

name: Brad St. George
text:
Quick, quality service. Good communication throughout the process. The work looks good as new.
My complaint: whatever they used during detail before returning the vehicle, left smears and dull haze on my interior. Yes, minor, but totally something that could have been avoided. Would absolutely recommend Joe Hudson to anyone needing work done.

name: Jessica Barnes
text:
I've gone to Joe Hudson's Collision Center twice (yes, TWICE) in the past 6 months. Both times were for the same exact thing- a person hit my car in a parking lot and the back bumper needed to be replaced. Both times, not only was everyone friendly, informative, and competent, they went above and beyond. Jennifer is very friendly both at the front desk and on the phone, which is an essential asset to any business. Speaking of the lobby area, they have AN EXCELLENT coffee machine that is so amazing it's worth mentioning.
In both instances, I've spent most of my time dealing with Clayton. He's very kind and does his job well. He's easy to talk to and explains all parts of the sometimes-confusing insurance side of things as well as how the actual repair will go. I can't sing his praises enough. He even filled my tires with air just to be nice! Also, whenever you have work done there, they detail your car, which I've never seen anywhere else. Kerry is THE MAN when it comes to this! He makes my car look brand new, seriously.
Don't take your car anywhere but Joe Hudson's. They're professional, timely, and do great work!

name: Reva Ramey
text: Super folks to work with who certainly went above and beyond to get my car repaired in the timeframe they promised. This was my second experience and both times I have been extremely satisfied.

name: Wendy White
text:
Very Professional, spent time with me explaining what was going to happen with repairs. The waiting area was pleasant and they offered coffee, water, etc. while I waited. They ordered the parts they would need, and then let me know when they would arrive so I could bring my car in at that time and get my rental car. I was not at fault in the accident so State Farm covered all charges. It took about 2 weeks for my repairs to be finished. Joe Hudson also sent me text updates on how the repairs were going.
My car looked like nothing ever happened. I will use
Joe Hudson again if needed, but pray I won’t have anymore accidents! Wendy White

name: steve buchanan
text: Kept me informed of each step with progress reports and finished work in a timely manner. Very nice work.

name: shadaryl king
text: Great service car looked brand new when it was finished would highly recommend

name: Thomas Patchen
text: Joe Hudson collision did a great job repairing our Honda. Very professional and kept me updated. The car looks brand new. Highly recommend!

name: Larry Hearld
text: Excellent service. Very responsive and flexible with scheduling. Kept me in the loop about what was being done, when, and when things would be done.

name: Robert Parsa
text: I had a wreck few weeks ago. I was looking for a place to get my car fixed. I saw reviews online and noticed Joe Hudson has awesome reviews and many happy customers. I decided to go to them. From the start to finish they did a fantastic job. Kept me updated all the way. The car does not look like work has been done on it. I am very happy with them and will use them again.

name: Craig Rodgers
text: Everyone was amazing and friendly. The communication was on point.  I would always refer to Joe Hudson for all of my future repair needs. Although I hope I don’t have too; LOL. Thank you to the entire staff and team over at Joe Hudson on 6th Ave. for putting me back in my Dodge Challenger in just a few days. Thank you!

name: Kate Prendergast
text: My car is shiny and new in just five days! I really appreciated how well they communicated and how kind and professional they were. Many thanks to the awesome team at Joe Hudson’s!

name: Alicia Gunter
text: Fantastic service! Got my repair done quickly and my car looks brand new. Not to mention the extra special detail cleaning of the car! They made sure my rental company was there waiting for me when I dropped my car off. This is the best service I have had from a body shop.

name: Shannon Taylor
text: I had a great experience with Joe Hudson from the moment I brought my car in to when I got it back. My car looked like new again. Wonderful service...

name: Regan Ford
text: Great staff and my repairs were done quickly. When they noticed the rental company was taking too long to come pick me up, a nice gentleman drove me. Then, I got updates throughout the entire process and when I had questions after, they stepped up and answered them all and made adjustments as necessary. Such great people!

name: Tom Maxwell
text: Very professional, on time, nice people! Keep up the great work!

name: alan cornelison
text: I have had 2 accidents both not my fault and both times it's gone to Joe Hudson. Darren has been amazing both times as have the entire staff. I am having some issues with some suspension work but they arent the ones who do that work. I am confident they will assist me in resolving this issue.

name: Angela Madison
text:
The staff was excellent from start to finish!
I was kept informed regarding the status of my car repair almost daily. They went above and beyond my expectations and even repaired my gas door , which was not expected but was a pleasant surprise ! I would definitely recommend Joe Hudson’s collision center to anyone who needs their car repaired!

name: Patricia Todd
text: I would highly recommend this company.  I could check online tthe status of my car repair and the staff was wonderful.

name: Big Syke
text: Awesome job !!! Darren and the team did an amazing job. Thank you so much. Very friendly people.

name: Katie Green
text: The staff at Joe Hudson in Birmingham is always wonderful to work with. Thanks for a great repair! It looks great!

name: E Graham
text: Great job on repairing my car and dealing with the insurance insurance company of the person who hit me. Darren Payne was very professional and accommodating.

name: Anthony Lucas
text:
Very nice and friendly staff; they did a great job on my Camaro, as well as keeping me in the loop every step of the way. And they were done with my car in no time.
Definitely recommend them!

name: Catrina K
text: Amazing customer service! Everyone was so nice and helpful at this shop. They were very quick too. I got my car back a day earlier than expected. The staff keeps you informed every step of the way via phone calls and emails. The shop was very clean and I trusted they would do a good job based on appearance. To top it off, they did a full detail inside and outside of my car! I highly recommend this shop!

name: Taylor Moates
text: Called me to let me know they found money in my car. Told me it was in someone's safe and that i could come and get it. Went there once, was told the man who knew the safe combo wasnt there. Went again and was told they lost it and they would send me a check. Called a week later to ask about the check and was told that they are not responsible for anything left in the cars. So, someone from there has $100 that doesnt belong to them. Dont know if they are a good body shop or not but I would stay away.

resp.text:
At Joe Hudson Collision Center we are dedicated to first class customer service. It is a top priority to us!
We are terribly sorry that you had a less than perfect experience with us and would like the opportunity to make things right in your eyes. If you would please give us a call, we will gladly talk this through and address your concerns.

name: dawgg4life2000
text: They did a wonderful job repairing my car, looks brand new. I would recommend them to everyone

name: Truthteller3100
text: Jennifer was the first person I encountered with Joe Hudson collision and she was patient and awesome! I loved  the email updates with the “repair status“ that you could look at anytime you wanted. The work on my 2017 Q60 Infiniti is beautiful!! My contact was Nate and he was kind, helpful and  very thorough! He worked well with my adjuster and made sure  everything that needed to be done to restore my car to brand new was accomplished . Five stars for sure! Could not be more pleased. P Dyer

name: Sam Eisa
text: Lots of people can do bodywork. Lots of people can paint. But not everybody puts the customer at the center. The people here were incredible, from the office manager Jennifer to my contact person Clayton, even to the painter I met. The shop is immaculate. The culture was contagious. Not to mention that the paint matched perfectly. When they were done, my car was clean inside and out. I wondered if they had detailed the car!  Well worth the drive to downtown Birmingham.

name: Meredith Walker-Sims
text: Had to have bumper repairs on my gold 2007 Lexus. It took them a while to match the gold color but when they did match the color it was perfect. My rental car company (Hertz) picked me up from the collision center and everyone was so nice and professional. I highly recommend Joe Hudson for any car repairs you need to make on your car.

name: Bob Fitts
text: I highly recommend Joe Hudson. Great work, timely, very friendly people.

name: Ananya Banerjee
text: Had a wonderful experience here. They were very kind and explained the whole process to me (this is my first car and it was hit). I got text and email updates showing me which stage my car was in. Would definitely recommend!

name: Mollison Daniel
text: Joe Hudson’s made the car repair process SO easy. They worked directly with insurance companies and called to give me status updates multiple times a week. Chris was extremely helpful and attentive, and I’ll definitely be using these guys for any future repairs I need. I really couldn’t have asked for an easier experience.

name: Lawrence2 Taylor
text: They treated me with respect.  Gave me an estimate and described what would be done to repair the left rear bumper and other small damage i sustained in a parking lot.  The work was FIRST CLASS and i would HIGHLY Recommend them for repairing your Vehicle..  this posted 30 June 2019.

name: C Trotter
text: Great people and experience.  Would recommend to anyone.

name: Oliver Manthorpe
text: One of, possibly the only, car repair shop that I will happily go back to if I need future repairs. Very pleased with the entire experience and how I was taken care of.

name: Ketron Henderson
text:
They were “Johnny in the spot”
Very personable and did an exceptional job.

name: Katie A.
text: I am extremely pleased with the service at Joe Hudson's Collision Center! The staff goes above and beyond what I ever expected to ensure that my car was not only repaired, but even returning my car in a better condition cleanliness wise then I left it. The staff treats you like you are a priority and not like you're just another number and their kindness and service is genuine. Even in the beginning when I accidentally walked into the garage instead of where I was supposed to be, I had a gentleman stop what he was doing and take the time to walk me over to where I needed to be. They promptly return phone calls and emails and even provided me with a link showing me what stage of the repair my vehicle was in so that I knew more definitively when it would be finished. Even after things were paid for, as I was getting my car I was dropping all of my things transferring stuff from the rental car and people rushed over to help. You may think that that's common courtesy but not everyone treats you like a valuable customer after they've already received payment. I just really appreciate the extra effort that this locations staff both inside the office and in the garage gives to the car and the customer. Special thank you Clayton Costello. As loquacious as I can be when I am anxious, he was able to set my mind at ease and explain everything in detail whenever I had a question or concern.

name: James Hooker
text: Snow days resulted in my bumper needing replacing and the lady who hit me's insurance company referred me to Joe Hudson's, formerly Watkins, my repair shop of choice. Since my last visit and with the name change the office is completely updated, and the service streamlined.  I was assigned a coordinator/estimator, Chris, and he handled the who repair expeditiously keeping me informed of the progress by online messages and phone calls.  My car was returned perfectly repaired and totally detailed, an extra bonus!

name: Gail Hill
text: I am fully satisfied with the work on my car, and with the way I was treated. They remembered my name, explained the work to me in a respectful manner, and completed the work in a timely manner.

name: Carolynn Moore
text: These guys are great.  They are our "go to" place for body work.  We won't let anybody else work on our Volvos.  Thanks guys.

name: Ashley Smith
text: Absolute great service! Chris at the downtown location was the best! Updated me frequently on my car’s status. Repairs only took a week and my car was like new when I got it back. Would absolutely recommend anyone use Joe Hudson’s downtown and I would definitely use again!

name: Anita Crow
text:
Just be ready to leave your vehicle for awhile. We had an appointment, at Joe Hudson, in Birmingham, and they didn't have us now. Said we could leave car, but they still would have to order parts. Told us it would be 10 days to order parts and fix car. I called and they said it would be ready, by end of that week, which it wasn't. Then, said Monday morning it would be ready, still wasn't, finally at 4:50pm, Monday afternoon, it was completed. I just think they must have more business than they can handle.
The car looks great though, so that's a plus.

name: Richard Crew
text:
Joe Hudson Collision is excellent in repair and service.They have recently reparied2 of our vehicles andwe
cannot say enough good things about everyone there.

name: Brandon Taylor
text: I had to take  my truck to Joe Hudson twice within 4 months because my truck was side swiped twice and I can say both times they were awesome. They give a great and fair price without over charging you, they keep u updated on everything they do to your vehicle, do not take them long to complete the work, the customer service is awesome cause everyone there is just so curtious and nice.. but last but not least they do a awesome detail on your vehicle when they are done. They wash and vacuum your vehicle so good it looks like it came off the showroom floor. I have to share one great experience that happened today.. I left my my truck bed cover at the shop and they drove 30 minutes to my house to bring it to me and put it on for me!!!  Now that's great customer service. So I highly recommend Joe hudsons collision center!!!!! Thank you guys!!!!

name: Cesar Romero
text:
My lowly Toyota was treated like a king amongst Porsche, Mercedes, and BMW
vehicles being repaired in this facility.  Great coordination with my insurance company and timely updates with the progress of repair resulted in an easy and painless process.  The company is composed of highly skilled enthusiasts, who were as passionate as myself in wanting a proper repair-- end result was as new condition, as if nothing happened.  A good example of an excellent facility with excellent people providing excellent results.

name: 87BABYCLASICKS

Perfect job no complaints.
Very detailed job and communicated with me during the whole process.

name: Kristi Wooley
text: These guys are AWESOME!!!!! Great customer service,  exceptional workmanship,  gave me a completion date and were ahead of schedule!!! Will never take my car to anoihther bodyshop!! Would highly recommend to anyone who needs their car repaired. Jamds down the best in town!!!

resp.text: We do hate to read that you feel so unhappy with the experience you had with our shop. Please call the manager of the location and speak to them concerning your experience. If you would like you can also email me directly at joehudsoncollision@gmail.com. We would like the opportunity to understand your frustrations. Understanding would allow us to correct anything that may need correcting.

text: Very professional, on time, nice people! Keep up the great work!

name: Caroline Pernell
text: The staff was very professional & took care of every detail, including small stuff. They also kept me posted on the repairs & returned calls in a timely matter. I would defintely use them again & recommend them to others.

name: Gabby Wms
text: Friendly and helpful staff that provided me with top notch service.

name: Tyler Conger
text:
This place went above and beyond what one would normally expect from a body shop.  No person wants to be in a position where he or she has to call on a collision center, but you will be pleased if you choose JHCC.  First and foremost, you can expect clear communication.  JHCC will tell you what they are going to do, tell you when they are doing it, and tell you what they did when they are done.  From initial estimate to vehicle pick-up, you can expect calls, texts and emails for status updates.

Most importantly, the work done on my vehicle was exceptional - down to replacing a decal in the appropriate spot.  Every person I spoke to was knowledgable about vehicle maintenance and I never felt "talked down to" or oversold.  I did actually have a small issue after I picked my vehicle up that needed to be addressed (due to part delivery and not the work of the shop).  The shop identified it immediately and went as far to pick my vehicle up while I was at my office, and deliver it back to me in incredible timing.  This proved to me that they stand by their warranty and customer service.   Again, the communication, the accessible locations, the quality workmanship and overall experience was unparalleled.

name: Robin Allen
text: Very professional, kept me informed everyone was super nice

name: Nella
text: You won’t find a team providing better service. Exceeded all expectations while keeping my safety and satisfaction 1st. Beyond thankful.

name: Darlene Key
text:
I arrived at 5:04 to pick up my van. The woman at the desk was frustrated because you close at 5. She huffed and acted like I was inconveniencing her. At one point she said she had to call her husband to pick up their child because she wasn’t paying by the minute for being late. I had told a woman at 8:30 when I called to check if it was ready that I would be there by 4:30. I ran late because my daughter got lost when picking me up.

I ask Wally if there was a charge for an estimate when I dropped my van off. He said there was not. As the woman was arranging for my car to be brought around I told her this. She said you can’t expect them to look at it and not pay. Had I been told it would have been 100 to look at it, that might have influenced getting one thing repaired. She then told me Toyota would charge more which is wrong because Toyota looked at it and said it was a body repair.

She was very rude the entire time she was helping me.  I have had a lot of work done when this shop was Watkins and I will not be back.

The additional charges came after they started the job, calling me several times claiming they had to tack on $500 for this, $400 for that.  They also did not do all the work that was discussed.

name: Adam Harper, Realtor EXP Realty LLC
text:
Is Radney actually Rodney? And Radney is just the southern way to say Rodney?

I’ve thought how amazing it would be to actually have the name Radney. If it is indeed Radney, respect ✊🏼.

name: Kevin Dao
text:
Thank you so much Mr. Todd for your time, patience, and most importantly, you and your teams' excellent service!

Prior to visiting Radney's Body Shop, I had been through four other body shops in the Oxford/Anniston area, receiving estimates for my vehicle. From recommendations of my co-workers whom all have been living here majority of their lives, to the more popular ones based on reviews on Google, I eventually decided to give Radney's Body Shop a visit.

Not only did Radney's Body Shop offer me the most affordable rate, but Mr. Todd's knowledge, affirmations, and patience with all of my questions on my vehicle gave me the confidence I needed to rely on this business.

When I dropped off my car, I was expecting to walk myself over to the car rental shop for my reserved rental, but Mr. Todd drove me there instead...and even picked me up when I was returning the rental! That's what I call customer service!

Mr. Todd and his team had my vehicle done within the time frame he had proposed. When I saw my vehicle for the first time since dropping it off, I couldn't help but feel like I just bought my car and drove it out of the dealership. Although it wasn't a major repair, the dent and scratches were gone and that alone made me feel like my car was brand new again!!

Thank you so much Mr. Todd!! For everything. Although I do expect to never see you again at your auto shop, I do hope that this review reaches out to individuals seeking a great auto shop that will get the job done in a timely manner at an affordable price. But should there ever be a time that I need body repair work for my vehicle, I will definitely be visiting you before anyone else.

text: This place fixed my car brakes instead of giving me an excuse why they couldn't. They drove me home and then pick me up so I could get my car. The mechanics were friendly and professional.

name: Charles Ward
text: I got into a accident  7 months ago. After that l was having problems with insurance company.  They wanted me to take the car to a body repair shop to get an estimate. I took the car to Holcomb Collison and Barry looked at it and he declare the car totaled.  The insurance company believe the car can be repaired and they sent me a check for $2,000 to fix the car. Well Barry talked to the insurance and he convinced them that will not be enough and it cost more than the car is worth to be repaired.  So the insurance company finally settled with me for the right amount. I really appreciated Barry's help.

name: Dennis Wright
text: Took to long and then did not complete the work.  Afterwards, they said they had made a mistake and for more money and time they could fix it.  When I was younger we used to call places like this a "clip joint".  Don't let your insurance company send you there.

text: They fixed my truck. Did a great job.

name: jim leary
text:
My Tundra came back looking better then the day I bought it.  Anthony is top notch guy. I’ve read all the reviews and people do make mistakes believe it or not we are human, it’s what the company does to make it right is what counts .. yes there was one miner issue with my rims from a cleaner that was used it took some of the paint off the decorative bolts , I pointed it out to them and 1st words was I’ll make it right give me a few days to get someone that can do this kind of work..   I got a call on a Monday that they can do it whenever so I took it the next day and picked it up the following day when it was finished..

Thank you Holcomb Collision

name: Albert Smith
text: Great staff. Very busy because they are so good at what they do

name: Carolyn Wiley
text: Fantastic shop! Excellent customer service and Impeccable body work.

name: Michael Dean
text: I have used them twice and both times the car has went back for rework apparently Barry doesn’t care about the quality of the finished product paints cracked , some areas were not painted , seals are damaged and not installed correctly, paints chipped , overspray that wasn’t cleaned off.

name: Jordan Bozarth
text:
I am so thankful for Holcomb Collision! After I backed my rango into a tree they did everything possible to get my car back to brand new. Being anxious (because I use my car for work) I always called just to see how much longer so I could get out of my husbands truck and blowing money on a gas guzzler. EVERY time they were beyond nice, did not care to answer any of my questions & treated me like a VALUED HUMAN. Not just a company after some money! I hope I never have to come back, but IF a tree just so happens to be in my way again- I know who I will use.
-Emily Bozarth!

name: Melissa Carroll
text: Great service! Fast too! They also kept us updated pretty much every day during our service.

name: Kathleen Buford
text:
I've been talking my cars here for years. They are very knowledgeable with insurance as well as independent work. They have handled smaller issues without digging a hole in my pocket.
Honesty is their best attribute!!! They are kind, nice and cordial and well.

name: l f
text: Mark Hafley, you really have no clue about the older man Robert whom you threatened and called retarded and ignorant. You would never measure up to half the man he is. He doesn't even have to work. He's retired but works part time because he enjoys work. He is a man of few words but is known to be the best bodyman around. I could fill you in on so much more about my FATHER Robert, but you don't even deserve to know him. What I do know is that my wrecked Ford Fusion came back in better shape than when I bought it after Holcomb fixed it.

However I have not taken it back yet to discuss the problems because the engine broke down so I cannot say if they will remedy the problems or not. Will try to add to post later.

name: Benjamin Parker
text: Brought them my truck to have the antenna mount replaced after getting damaged at a car wash. They were very friendly and fast to get me in and out. On top of that i had a minor scratched area on my front fender, around the tire well, with yellow paint, from the pole i grazed, stuck in the scratches. They removed the yellow paint and buffed down the scratch without me asking or having to pay for it. I was very pleased with the entire experience.

text:
Had my bumper fall out and they fixed it cheaper than other places quoted me. They did an excellent paint job and my car looks and drives great.

The staff was very nice and had a great atmosphere.

name: jason few
text: I have brought my business to Affordable for many years now. They are absolutely wonderful people who do top notch work. I would recommend them to anyone . Five stars for sure.

name: Lena Beam
text: If I could give more stars to this place, I’d gladly give them 10+. They are always so nice and understanding and really go above and beyond for their clients. I’ve dealt with them twice so far and if I ever need anything done with my car, they are the first that I would go to every time. I recommend them to anybody needing work done. Thank y’all for being the best!

name: Kimberly Shoemaker
text: I cannot say enough positive about this establishment. I called on a Thursday to see how much they charged to restore headlights. As soon as I found out it started off lower than most I had to check it out. So they told me to show up between 10-12 the next day and they could fit me in. They did just that. They had me in and out within an hour. While there I was able to sit on the couches they have in the lobby/office and relax while doing some schoolwork. I also had an amazing conversation with the boss and his wife. I've never met more friendly people nor more helpful. I definitely will be returning for anything to do with my vehicle. My headlights work amazing now. A spectacular job and a spectacular place. Thank ya'll so much!!!

name: Pamela Quinney
text: 1st time customer. From the moment I walked in Mrs Michelle had a smile on her face and was very nice and professional. I received an estimate and went on my way. I returned the next day UNANNOUNCED at 4:45 on a Friday AND it was Memorial Day weekend. I honestly thought they would tell me to come back Tuesday. Nope. I was able to leave my car. I picked my Malibu up today and it looks brand new again. Thank u Affordable Auto. My new body shop!!!

name: Kimberly Shoemaker
text: I cannot say enough positive about this establishment. I called on a Thursday to see how much they charged to restore headlights. As soon as I found out it started off lower than most I had to check it out. So they told me to show up between 10-12 the next day and they could fit me in. They did just that. My headlights work amazing now. A spectacular job and a spectacular place. Thank ya'll so much!!!

name: Angela Ashcraft
text: They have excellent customer service skills and do great work! They do what they say they will for the price they quote. We have had three different vehicles repaired and have been very pleased!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words of support.

name: Bishop Weekley
text: Good customer service but the prices could be better.

resp.text: We appreciate your review.  In reviewing our records we do not show a vehicle estimate written for you.  We do make every effort to work with our suppliers to minimize the cost for our customers while still providing a quality product.

name: Austin Pardue
text: Had a great experience with this shop. Had them strip, prime, and paint my front bumper that was peeling from a previous paint job. The result was amazing, no flaws in the paint and the color match was perfect! I'm so happy I didn't let maaco do this job and instead gave it to professionals. You definitely get what you pay for! WOW!

name: Johanna Workman
text: My sister Sue and I used to work there. Tim White is an exceptional business owner that treats his employees and customers with the upmost dignity and respect.

name: Kylee Hovel
text: I had an unfortunate accident and my brand new (to me) Tahoe needed the whole front end replaced.  After seeing the reviews online I declined to allow Professional Collision to fix it as Geico suggested.  I found Affordable Auto and from the first minute they have been amazing.  Excellent, personable customer service.  They handled the insurance adjuster, got to work on my vehicle immediately, and have kept me up to date every step of the way.  They have made this entire process effortless on my part.  I will highly recommend these guys to everyone.

name: Tillie Warmack
text: I have used Affordable Paint and Automotive Center on several occasions and they were very professional.  The customer service as well as the service was outstanding!  Ms. Michelle is a jewel.

name: Holly Lanther
text: Be wary. Read the estimate carefully no matter what you tell them or show them

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  Even with our best efforts we can not always fulfill everyone's expectations of what an item should cost.  We do give written estimates and we do review these estimates with the customers and it is very disheartening to know even with added materials and labor given to this job at no additional cost we were not able to satisfy your expectations.

name: Faye Ramskog
text: Affordable Auto did a most professional repair on my 2004 Toyota Camry! Also cleaned,polished,and added a wonderful scent to interior! Very pleased,and especially the best price!!!

name: Marie Davis
text: My 2000 Honda still runs great, but last year the driver side door lock wore out and the door would barely latch. Cockrell's quoted me $1,900.  The repair was absolutely necessary but I couldn't pay that. I was very frustrated. Thankfully I decided to get a second quote from Affordable Auto Paint & Collision. They charged me $270 and completed the repair the next day. A year later, no problems with the lock at all. I highly recommend this shop.

name: Rurouni _X
text: I'm the Painter for this shop! So if you want your vehicle to shine again, come see Tim at Affordable Auto Painting and Collision!

name: Blake Tennant
text: Really great work! They were very thorough and knowledgeable. They definitely went the extra mile!

name: Tiger Johnson
text: Very strict hours. Wasnt even willing to work with me on getting a quote when I'm doing a lot of body work and a full paint job, and am willing to make the drive from pensacola. When I spoke to them on the phone they were rude and screaming at me over a lot of noise. They dont sound like they really want anyones business.

resp.text: Mr. Johnson,  I am sorry if we were unable to communicate clearly with you during your recent phone call.  Our office staff does work in the shop area frequently and at times it is loud.  We are truly sorry if you understood us to be rude that is not our way of handling business.  We do try to accommodate our customer as best we can with our business hours.

name: abe simmons
text: The service 2weeks out. Plus dont want my business.  Issues

resp.text: Mr. Simmons we appreciate your review.   I think maybe you have our shop confused with another.  We are not currently 2 weeks backlogged and we welcome all customers with or without insurance work.  Please feel free to call our office if you are in the Mobile area or come by for a free estimate of repairs needed.  Thank you.

Kevin Crowell @ Crowell Automotive inc.

text: I had two claims. We are not complete yet. The body repair is like brand new. A few problems work glass, I have been treated as a vip. I use to be a body man an had my own shop. So, I can tell you they do the very best in body work. I highly recommend Joe Hudson. You may find a cheaper deal, trust me you get what you pay for. Plus their work is backed up with a lifetime guarantee. That is something I never did. Joe is the place to go. 👍👍👍👍👍

name: Heather Caldwell
text: This is my second time to use them in the past 15 years. Both experiences were great! They are fast and the work is always great. They call almost everyday to update you on your vehicle and even send text messages to let you know the progress. I couldn’t be happier.

name: Angie Boyette
text: Brought my car to them, after the place in Hartselle couldn't get it right after 5 times... JOC got the job done!!

name: Marlotion “The_Squeeddd”
text: I was involved in a near death experience about a week ago and filed a claim through my insurance who referred me to this company. Joe Hudson’s Collision Center was able to get me in quick and tell me about how the repair process will work. All I have to say is they did a FANTASTIC job on my vehicle and retrieving an item from my vehicle that was crucial to my police report. To say they did a good job is a HUGE understatement. They were AMAZING! My car looks like it hadn’t even been damaged. I highly recommend them for your repair needs. Huge shout out to Seth for helping me out and getting me back on the road!

name: Samual Thornton
text: They fixed my vehicle very quickly and it was absolutely great work.

name: T Freeman
text: Took my F150 to JHCC Decatur AL. with major damage to my bed. My truck looks brand new. Can't tell there was was ever a scratch. The repairs were done with super speed. I was expecting to be without my truck for at least another week. Never using anyone else. It's JHCC Decatur for me from here on out.

name: Kimberly Rivers
text: I was really amazed with the service.   I was texted with details about my vehicle during each process of the repair.  They did an outstanding job on paint and parts replacement.   Extremely fast service. Not one but all employees very friendly and professional.   I highly recommend Joe Hudson’s.

name: Maria Gillespie
text: Great service all around! The service was great and the finished product was amazing. Love the updates you get each step of the way. Seth and Trina in the front were wonderful! 10/10 would recommend

name: Martha Rodriguez
text: They do a good job a great job and so courteous with their customers that commendare the cars  Is amazing when they get done

name: Ricky Peck
text: JHCC was recommend to me by my insurance company after my car was damaged from a hit and run while at the Target Parking lot. JHCC did a great job of repairing my car in a timely manner and made the whole process easy. I would recommend them.

name: Barbara Bruchs Winn
text: I’m a 74 year old retired widow. I’ve never had to deal with this before. They were patient with me and all my questions and took excellent care of my car. I couldn’t have had better care and service. My car looks new again. I highly recommend them and would definitely use them again.

name: Janice Hagood
text: These are the most professional and excellent people. My truck fender was hit and they repaired it perfectly.

name: Cindy Garcia
text:
I was very pleased with the service at Joe Hudson's Collision Center in Decatur Alabama.  Everything was done in a timely manner and the people
were very courteous.  I would highly recommend them!

name: Mike Throneberry
text: This process has been absolutely painless, the communication was flawless.  I could even drop my rental car at the shop.  I now know who will be getting my business in the future.  Thank you for being a Business who honors their word.

name: Tammy Alexander
text: Very pleased with the work they did on my Subaru Outback. Took longer than expected but the work was excellent! My car was spotless when I picked it up. The staff was professional and friendly. Would recommend this business.

name: Mike Hogan
text: Very happy with all repairs at this time. Truck looks great. All request were taken care of, love the warranty. I have never got a warranty in writing. Thanks Joe Hudson.

name: Richard Hall
text: Really pleased with every aspect of service and work performed. Surprised parts were as high as they were but know it is beyond Hudson's ability to control that. Highly recommend.

name: Sheri Tippett
text: As soon as I pulled up someone came out to greet me and talked to me about the work being done on my car. I filled out out paperwork online which was very easy. The sent me updates through text on each step that was done on my car! How awesome is that! I took my car in on Monday morning and by Thursday lunchtime it was ready to pick up. I would recommend Joe's Collision Center to everyone!

name: Casey Ingouf
text: Joe Hudson’s is very professional and easy to work with. Their body work is top-notch and reliable. They are like magicians; bad things go in, good things come out. You can’t go wrong when you go with Joe!

name: Amy
text: Professional staff & and excellent work. I am extremely pleased and thankful I chose them to fix my vehicle! They went above and beyond to make sure my car was fixed properly, but also washed it and thoroughly vacuumed! (Which was a nice surprise for a busy mom!)

name: Sue Bowling
text: I only  had  minor  damage.  But  my  car  looks  great.  Had a  little  white  dust  in  my  back  seat.  But  that  was  a easy  clean  up. And you  can  also look  online  and  see  the  phases on the  progress of the  work.  I highly  recommend  Joe  Hudsons collision. Thank  you  for  a great  job.

name: John McCloud

text: They handled my claim quickly and professionally! I was updated each step of the way about my car. They did a great job on my repair. They were all very friendly and their customer service is top notch. We will be doing business with them again!

text: Great, friendly, and timely service!  They also notified me of each step in the process along the way as they repaired my vehicle.  I highly recommend them.

I have used Joe Hudson of Decatur twice, so far. They are kind, reasonable, professional, friendly and do quality work. I wouldn't take my car to any other place. Thanks you guys
Olivia

text: Great Business! They replaced my back bumper and trunk, painted it matching the paint exactly, cleaned it up, and had it out out the shop in 8 days. Great experience!

name: Robert Caspers
text: This was a repeat service for us. Joe Hudson maintains their well deserved reputation. A preferred shop for USAA but they are where I have gone on my own and will continue to rely on them for auto body and paint needs.

name: Katie Steinberg
text: This was the best experience I’ve ever had with a collision center. The people are so nice and helpful. They processed and completed my repairs in a couple of days. The automated text/email service that keeps you updated on your vehicle’s status was SO nice! It kept you updated every step of the way! I’ll return for any future work we need!

name: Kathy Waldrop
text: From the moment I was contacted to when I picked up my car EVERYONE and EVERYTHING was PREFECT!!! Very professional and caring group of people.   Was keep updated on all phases of the  repair...I really like the texts that show the progress on the repair...Drew went the "extra mile "...to make sure I was satisfied.   Cannot say enough GOOD things about the EXCELLENT service.  Highly recommended them!!!

name: Wanda
text:
My car is ready a little earlier than I expected! Tracy called me each week to tell me what stage we were on and what was next, such a sweet and kind lady! Yes, I'd recommend them to anyone, they do beautiful work! I'm on Covid-19 quarantine or I'd be over there today getting my car! Two more days till results and praying for a get out of jail free card and a big NEGATIVE stamp or sticker somewhere prominent! Thank you so very much JHCC for another job well done! I'll try to add photo when I can get one!

Seriously y'all, Joe Hudsons in Decatur has been professional, kind and kept me up to date each week on progress made and what stage would be next. They didn't have to do that for me but Tracy's sweet, cheerful voice reassured me that they know their game and have it all in control!
You will not regret bringing your business here! Thank you again JHCC and the entire crew for being amazing to work with!
~Wanda

name: Shameika J
text: Great job with repair. Hard to contact. Have to call multiple times to get someone. Don't always have the option to leave a message.

name: Wendy Morgan
text: Joe Hudson always delivers. They communicate step by step in the process and are always professional.

name: Sue McClellan
text: The service was excellent and the body work was perfect. They made an unfortunate accident so easy to deal with. Updates on the work was appreciated.  Sue McClellan

name: Glenn Rutledge
text: Love the text alerts, and the car looked like new! Washed, detailed and even shined the tires when done! Service was fast, very professional and outstanding overall. Won't hesitate to go back. Their paint has a lifetime warranty and they cover all parts they replace. Hard to beat!

name: Elizabeth Cossentine
text: They were absolutely amazing. They worked around my schedule and even offered to bring my car to wherever would be most convenient. If at all possible, I will always use Joe Hudson.

name: Jeanne Mayfield
text: Did a fantastic job, would highly reccomend the body guy, Justin Latham,  His work just cant be beat, If you need some body work done right you have to go to thjs guy.

text: I was completely satisfied with my experience and definitely would recommend Joe Hudson's to anyone looking for vehicle repair service.

name: E Stolz
text: Super fast and professional.  Work is top notch!

text: Great and prompt customer service. Dropped my car off for repair on a Monday. It was ready by Thursday. I love the text message updates giving the status of the repairs every step. Everyone there was very friendly when I called and came in person.

name: Calvin Underwood
text:
You can not tell my car was ever rear ended. I was kept up to date on repairs. Kevin repaired my car as if it was his
Highly recommend.

text: You have done all of my work for the past 15 years.  Great eork

name: Dakota Richerson
text: The team handled my claim quickly and kept me updated through the entire process. Not only did they do exceptional work, they also detailed the vehicle before returning it to me. Will use this shop time and time again.

name: Kieron Butler
text:
Where should I begin...25 days to do the repairs, but still isn't right. Runs in the paint, damaged parts were put back on the vehicle. Waiting another 2 weeks to get parts. Broken systems were not repaired.

Now, they say they will correct all the issues noted, and have been decent about addressing my issues, so I won't complain about that. I just expected it to be right the first time they said it was done. I won't say it is a bad shop, but the quality control leaves something to be desired. Recommend you look closely at your vehicle when you pick it up.

name: Kimberly Olson
text: Very easy to schedule, kept me informed every step of the way via text, and called when ready. The car looked better than expected and they even buffed out other areas. I am so impressed and highly recommend Joe Hudson.

Very impressed everyone was nice .the work was done on time and our kia soul looks better than it did brand new.
Will be back if we ever need anymore repairs

text: Joe Hudson’s collision Center provided the best customer service I have ever experienced. Communication was outstanding . By the way the workmanship was perfection.  Simply the best and well worth the drive

I'm very satisfied with JHCC, and I hope never to have to have my car repaired again, but if I do, I won't hesitate to call them!

name: Christy Chaney
text: My experience with Joe Hudson's Collision was excellent.  Several times they notified me via email, text, and phone the status of my repairs.  I received pictures of my car showing exactly where they were in the process.  And I received my car days before the estimated time by the insurance company.  As for the repairs, I look at my car and think "What damage?"  There are no visible signs whatsoever that my car had ever been in an accident.  Definitely a 5-star experience.

resp.text: This location can stay pretty busy. That being said, when Mr. Loyd came by the shop to schedule his repairs, we discovered that he did not have insurance that would cover a rental for him. To make things easier on Mr. Loyd, and keep him in a vehicle, we scheduled an appointment rather than keep his truck and have it sit in our lot for a few days. When the time for his appointment drew near, we had an unexpected tow come in that would have kept us from getting to his truck immediately. Therefore, again, knowing that we would have his truck a little longer than planned we rescheduled his appointment thinking we were making it easier on him.

text: I had brought my 2006 Toyota Avalon for driver door damage in a wreck. When I got my car back I was not happy about 4 things.  First, The rear bumper is missing clips so it just flops in the wind while driving. Second, the door where it was repainted, there is buffing swirls from someone who didn’t know what they were doing or didn’t care ect. Third, my locks on my door click over and over due to my back door lock not being connected so I have to manually lock the door now. The fourth reason is my window visors,  when they replaced the driver door it had a window visor, they took it off the old door and also broke it in the process and then continued to put it on my new door and glued the pieces back! Why in the world would anyone do that!? I would’ve been happy if they would’ve left it off to begin with. Definitely do not recommend. I will do business elsewhere

name: Matthew Vought
text: My family and I have been taking our vehicles here for over 35 years, and have always received excellent service and competitive pricing.  My brother took his car to a dealership when his car "broke down" in another town and was told that his engine was blown and needed replaced (about $2,500 estimate), so of course we towed the car over an hour & a half to Turner's.  The team there let us know it was only vapor-locked, and the "repair" was $30.  They also showed us how to fix the problem (for free) if it ever happened again!  Their integrity is outstanding and I wouldn't take my vehicles anywhere else.  Thank you, Turner Automotive!

name: Roger Butner
text: I had an unfortunate accident with a deer while on vacation at the beach. Joe Hudson’s Collision Center in Mobile, AL not only got my car back to like-new condition, but they completed the work a full week earlier than they projected, and kept me informed of each step in the process via their text system. BEYOND SATISFIED! THANK YOU!!!

name: Regina Collins
text:
I was thoroughly impressed with Joe Hudson’s Collision Center in Mobile. Amanda at the front desk was so friendly and knowledgeable. Joey the adjuster was very efficient in his appraisal.  The work I had done was perfectly executed and In a very timely manner.  I really appreciated their keeping me updated on the progress of the repairs. I didn’t have to call to see what was going on; they kept me informed by text.
I would definitely recommend Joe Hudson’s to anyone who needs work done on their vehicle.
Thank y’all so much!!
Oh, and the coffee was delicious too. 😀

text: They were very professional and kind. Super fast too! They keep you updated via text throughout the entire process. And my car looks awesome! Would definitely recommend! If I ever need body work again I’ll only use Joe Hudson!

name: Marlyn Boswell
text: We had a wreck and banged up our Lexus. When we picked it up the car looked brand spanking new. All knicks and dents are gone. The paint job is beautiful and we have new outside lights.  We could not be more pleased.  Employees are excellent and kept us informed from beginning to end. We highly recommend this company.

name: mike b
text: I just picked up my truck from Joe Hudson after it being worked on there for 6 weeks. I was rear ended and my vehicle required some serious repairs. Joe Hudson worked with my insurance and kept me thoroughly updated throughout the entire 6 week repair process. The shop manager Sam could not have been more communicative with updates on my vehicle (at least once a week) and Amanda up front was always available to help facilitate my needs. I’ve never been through a process like this but I’m certain it couldn’t have gone any smoother than it did. I would give Joe Hudson 10 stars if I could. A special thank you goes out to all the guys behind the scenes who performed the work, my truck looks brand new!

name: Judi Matthews-Sutton
text: From our 1st visit to Joe Hudson's Collision for an estimate, everyone has been professional, courteous, helpful. They kept in touch during the time our truck was being repaired. Exceptional customer service!!!

text: Nice people! Awesome work and the price is great. Quote me 500 less than the competition! See before and after pictures.

name: James R Carter
text:
My Insurance co recommended Joe Hudson's and I was amazed how fast they repaired mt car. A large dog ran into the front Drivers side and did alot of damage. It was towed in on Thursday afternoon and I got my car back the following Wed. They even offered to get me a rental car and even bring my car back to my house if I didn't have transportation there. Joey and Sam were on top of things in getting my car back to me. I would definitely recommend this company to anyone, I'll give them a 5 star rating.
B. Carter

name: Melissa Jones
text: I had such a great experience with Joe Hudson Collision. They were very nice, prompt with my repairs and did a wonderful job on my vehicle. I had other items outside of the repairs and they gave great estimates and even let me in on ways to do those for cheaper than expected. I dealt with Sam mostly, who was absolutely amazing, kept me updated about every few days on my car and even had it done ahead of schedule. The receptionist and everyone who worked there that I come in contact with was very nice and professional and I would recommend everyone to Joe Hudson Collision.

text: I’ve used Joe Hudson a few times now.  I will say this. Any body shop can repair damage, but it take a special company to have perfect customer service every time.  They are amazing to work with, very fast with the Repair, and made sure to communicate every step of the way so I knew what What’s going on with my vehicle. When I went to pick it up, everything looked perfect and they had detailed the car. I have use them in the past and will continue to use them from here on out. Not only are they the best customer service in auto bodywork, but pretty much any company I use for anything these days. And it’s hard to find good customer service anymore. - Chase!

text:
My 2016 Honda CRV was crushed in on the left hand side on both doors but having them fix it in 72 hours was not the most amazing part. The customer experience was. Everyone there was so professional, kept their promises on calling me when they said they would and giving me accurate time frames.

My car looks like it's brand new.

name: Joyce Gamble
text: They got on the job repairing my car and finished earlier than promised.

name: Shelia Collins

name: Mobile Hadith
text: My first name is Tony, I drive an accord, Honda. There was bumper damage, and slight damage to the grill and headlight which could be buffed out. I dropped the car at 10:30 am on Thursday. It was estimated to be a two day job. At 3pm, I got a call that the car was finished. I was shocked, that they were able to get the bumper, paint it, clear coat it, etc. and the bumper base under it which was damaged, and the grill and buff the headlight all in one day. Talk about quick, efficient, friendly service?! Over and beyond that! Amazing. Thank you to everyone there, the people I met and the people who worked on  my car, heck they even cleaned it for me. So yes, all done in one day between 10:30 am and 3 pm. Now, review my damage noted above, it is not what you would call severe damage, but, just getting the bumper, painting it, clear coating it, and it being dry and reassembled is enough to be shocked at how quick they did it. Thank you again to everyone who worked on my car, and thanks for cleaning it, inside and out!

They got done and the car was almost as clean inside and out as when we bought it brand new. Also they were genuinely nice to us both. Thank you very much for the good work. Just wish you had a detailing service separately that I could use from time to time just for getting my truck and her car cleaned, it really wad that nice.

name: Matt Taylor
text: I think the best way to judge a company is how they handle a problem.   We had a problem that the wheels for my car weren’t made anymore.  Their amazing staff worked with me and did a great job solving the problem.  I have had several cars repaired here and they have always done a great job.

name: Cheryl Hall
text: Car was taken right away. I was updated everyday of the progress. Very impressed With results. Amazing work. Awesome!!!!

name: JoAnna Danzy
text:
I was rear-ended on a Wednesday morning driving to work. Spoke with insurance representatives, and Joe Hudson's Collision Center was #1 on their list of approved collision centers in the area for repairs. Took my vehicle in the same day-- waited maybe 20 minutes for a thorough estimate.
Waiting area is clean, comfortable, and drank a cup of complimentary hot chocolate-- much needed on a day that was below 30 degrees outside!

After explaining the estimate and repairs needed, Jeremy was on the phone checking to see if all parts were available for repairs.
The staff was friendly, helpful, answered all questions, and explained the damage to the vehicle as well as what they were going to do to fix it.

Dropped my car off Thursday morning, and was delightfully surprised to receive text messages on the status of the vehicle and repairs throughout the day-- high tech service :)
I was ecstatic my vehicle was ready, repaired, painted, and clean when I picked it up later that afternoon-- roughly 7 hours-- done!

I hope no repairs are needed in the future, but I know where to go if something happens. Unbeatable customer service, speed, and attention to detail! Outstanding! Ten stars!

name: Rose Moore
text: It was the greatest everything went real smooth.and I would recommend them to my friends and family

text: Joe Hudson’s Collision was fast and professional. Everyone was very nice! They have an online service so you can know about where your car is in the process of being fixed. I wish they did more than just collision repair.

They even pointed out some scratches and dents that had nothing to do with the minor accident I was in, and they took care of them at no charge.  I recommend this place and even though I hope to never walk through there door again, if I ever get in another accident, Joe Hudson's is where I am going.

name: Wilfredo Izquierdo
text: I have been taking my heads and blocks to this particular place since 2010. They range from Kia's, to Acura's, to Ford 302, and I admire the work of Allen ( foreman ) and his crew. I like how the crew always shows me when there is a problem, and how they going to go on about it to fix the problem. A very long time ago, they short blocked a B18 Acura and that car ran forever and even drove it back and forth to Miami FL a whole bunch of times. I don't know what I and a lot of people would do if they ever retired and closed the doors. The only thing I would say to a prospective customer is to call ahead as they are always slammed packed, or make sure you have a spare car until they can fix you up, because it can set you back ( time ) a little bit. But call Allen first. Other than that, their work is flawless and they have never let me down. Good job Allen and Crew you guys are the best in Birmingham and can't beat those prices!!

text:
*WOW*
If I could give 10 stars, I would!

The whole team at Maaco is absolutely amazing! They truly exceeded my expectations in every area. Krista (sales technician) goes above and beyond to ensure everything is fairly priced and handled properly & efficiently. Carlos (the owner) was very friendly and gave me a ride back to work when he realized I didn’t have one. Michael and the guys in the shop did a wonderful job painting and got my car painted quickly, while still delivering high quality work.

In fact, they got my car finished earlier than expected and knew I needed my car over the weekend, but they asked if I could bring it back on Monday because they wanted to touch up a tiny spot they saw that was completely unnoticeable to me. It is evident that they have a high attention to detail and value the quality of their work.

I seriously couldn’t have asked for a more positive experience and I highly recommend Maaco to anyone needing anything done to their vehicle!

text: This guy rebuilt my motor and offered a 90 day warranty.  Motor locks up 30-45 days later and the guy tell  me to get a lawyer. Do not never use this guy. He does shotty work and charged me almost $3000 and will not own up to it. I am calling my lawyer. Because the day after I got it back the transmission goes out and he said if the transmission shop said it was his fault he would fix it. Well they did find job weld allover the casing which I have pictures of and he did not own up to that either. So good luck JD

text: THANK YOU JAY for fixing my car on such a short notice! The service is impeccable and I reccomend them to anyone in the Birmingham / Hoover area!

name: Ahmad Diab
text: I’ve looked for years to find a place in Montgomery (much less anywhere) that takes care of your vehicle and that would be willing to work on my Isuzu Truck. I live in Montgomery and it is worth it to make the drive to Automotive and Truck Doctor in Birmingham. This place solved the problem no one could, my truck was throwing some arbitrary codes. It’s been a year and no problems! These people are awesome. They were all incredibly helpful, all of them know their cars. I would highly recommend  this shop. resp.text: Mr Lessley, I am the owner of Smith's Body Shop & Wrecker Service, Randy Smith. We take great pride in the satisfaction of our customers and for them to have a pleasant experience and professional repair. I am so sorry for the experience you had. I do need additional information so I can investigate this further. Can you please call me at 256-708-7326. I need to know at which location the repairs were done. Albertville or Holly Pond. Who was the estimator you were dealing with, the year, make and model of your vehicle and were the repairs in your name? As soon as I can look into this further, I would like to contact you so we can correct this for you. We also take pride in honesty and integrity so if you had any item missing from your vehicle we would like to resolve this as well. Sincerely, Randy Smith

text: Been getting the run around with collision shops in Florida after I was involved in a hit and run accident during 4th of July weekend. When I called BMW of MCC, the worker I talked to initially told me October but after emailing him the estimate from my insurance company, he said that they could fit me in their schedule for August. I am very impressed with how accommodating this shop seems to be!!

name: Jeff N
text: I was calling around to see if it was possible for a shop to estimate my vehicle and take it in the same week. Most shops I called told me that it'll take about a week for them to get a chance to look at the car. I spoke with Danny and he said that I can look at the car anytime but taking it in depends on how severe the damages are. I brought the vehicle in and right away, he told me that he'll take it in because if water got on the car, it'll damage the electrical components. After a few minutes of taking down my info and he called Hertz for me to see if they can pick me up to get my rental. After 10 minutes of trying, he said "You know what? I'll just take you up there". He even waited till I signed the documents to my rental. The level of service he's provided me made me feel like I chosen the right place to take my vehicle to. The quality of work to the service, top notch! I definitely would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you Jeff for your kind words! We are so glad we were able to provide you with a great experience and exceed your expectations! We'll be happy to pass your positive feedback to Danny. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help you with. We look forward to your next visit!

text: So far, not so good. BMW Collision received my daughter's car early afternoon on January 1/19/21. Damage to the car was minor--a detached front bumper/grill. But it took six days to transmit the estimate to the insurance company, 1/25/21. Insurance approved it that day. They also told the insurance company that they had the bumper, brackets, and splash shield in stock and that the repair would be a 2-3 day job. When I reached out to BMW Collision on the 3rd day (1/28/21), they said there was "a parts delay" and that it would be "first of next week." Turning a 2-3 day job into at least six! What?

text: I used the collision center many times. A Nissan Titan, a Honda Civic, A Toyota 4Runner (twice), and now a Ford F-150. I have never owned a BMW but their paint booth is the best. Great service all around and amazing peoole.

name: Rian Haynes
text: BMW of Mobile Collision Center performed the repair on my 2018 Lexus RX 350.  The quality of the repair exceeded all expectations.  The metallic blue paint matched perfectly, and the fit up of the body panels was excellent.  Jeremy Eck worked hard to make this a first rate experience.  He keep me informed during the entire process, and he went out of his way to make sure I was completely satisfied.  The at fault insurance company was unresponsive and difficult to work with, but Jeremy was persistent in getting the claim approved.  I would unreservedly recommend this repair shop for their top notch customer service and quality work.

resp.text: We are very happy to hear that we were able to provide you with an enjoyable experience. We thank you for your business and look forward to your next visit!

text:
BMW company should be very proud to have such a kind understanding gentlemen as Jimmy working for them. I have never met him face to face only phone conversations. When my daughter and grandson were in a car accident back in July this year 2018. I noticed him and told him our concerns and need for services and he jumped right in. I had no idea the amount of time and effort it took to complete the work on my daughters car. Jimmy keep us informed and updated with every detail as it took place. I am very pleased with the work of the service department of BMW and I would gladly recommend them for services. Thank you Jimmy for all you do at BMW Mobile Alabama!! May God bless you and keep you , may His face shine upon you and give you His peace.
Have a great day!

Mrs Parker and Daughter Kiera Bailey
Gadsden Al. By way of Atlanta Ga.

name: Liz Sekul
text: I had a little fender bender last week and called my insurance company to see who they recommend. After making a little list, I did some quick research and realized that BMW Collision Center in Mobile had the best ratings of recommended shops. I called and immediately was helped by a gentleman named Danny. He was so kind and knowledgeable; I felt like I was making a good choice. Because I live an hour away he had me send photos so he could give me an idea of the time frame we were looking at for my repair. His communication and confidence with my particular situation was very reassuring. Today I brought my car in, and he greeted me before I could even walk in the door. From the first phone call to the moment we shook hands as I left, I couldn’t be more pleased with my interaction with Danny and BMW Collison. I will always bring my car to them, and will highly recommend them to others! It’s so nice to work with trustworthy people who truly care about you as a customer! I’m so thankful for this experience!

resp.text: Thank you Liz for your kind words! It is always great to hear that we were able to make a customer’s experience truly exceptional! We thank you for your business and look forward to your next visit!

name: Josh Matthews
text:
They have no idea how to work with an insurance company. They screwed it up and 3 days after the car is done they are still trying to fix things with insurance. After 3 days I called and specifically asked what the full amount needed to release the car was and was told in no uncertain terms to bring $2k and they would release it. When I got there they changed their minds and wanted $4k. Drove 3 hours to pick it up only to have to leave without it. Typical bmw.

To be clear this was no miscommunication. Before I left my house I asked specifically “what amount of money do I need to bring with me for the car to be released” and was told $2k in response to that question. Now they want to act like that is just what insurance still owes them for a supplement on top of my deductibles, after 3 hours previously telling me they would release the car for a flat $2k payment. A lie.

resp.text:
Thank you for speaking with me about this and allowing me to address this. We truly appreciate your business and we’re deeply sorry for this miscommunication. If there is ever anything I can assist you with, please feel free to contact me.

Craig Rowley
Collision Manager
crowley@Group1Auto.com

name: Susan Stewart
text:
Very little communication, if any from BMW of Mobile Collision Center.  Only information I received from them is when I called them to find out status of my car.    Read reviews before I took my car there and was surprised at the comments compared to my experience.   Would not recommend them for any service.

Mentioned my experience to service representatives over the phone prior to picking up my car and did not see any improvement in communication.  When I picks up my car service manager would not even look at me.

resp.text:
Hi Susan,

We apologize you were unable to receive our attempted communications… Our records indicate the collision manager personally attempted to reach you multiple times on the progress to the best of our ability.  We hope you are pleased with the repairs on your Volvo and if you need anything in the future please contact me personally at scottdavis@group1auto.com.

Scott Davis
General Manager

Mary Tatum

text: This place sucks! The customer service is horrible and they take their sweet time on your vehicle. The quality of work is not that good. I took my car there for a simple fix and i didn’t receive it back until after a month later not to mention it took me a month to book an appointment . I had to call several people just to get my car back in a decent time. The guy Kerry avoid at all cost. I will not be going back to Jack Ingram and of their dealerships. I don’t advise their establishments to anyone.
