When we picked-up our car this morning, the work was flawless!  Plus, the paint job was equally impressive.  I couldn't be happier with the end result.  Well done!  I will always trust Action Collision to handle all my future car repairs.  They are true professionals, and what's more, they are super nice people!

name: Keith T
text: Totally overlooked me inside the office. Front office guy was on the phone,  made eye contact and I took a seat to wait on him. Once he got off the phone he did not acknowledge me at all. Another costumer walk through the door,  white lady, and he immediately starts to help her. You will never work on anything I own again.

resp.text:
I am so sorry for your bad experience Keith T. Fridays in the collision repair business are crazy and often if someone comes in without an appointment for an estimate it can be difficult to service customers who come to pick up their cars after the repairs are complete, like the lady you referred to in your review. We value all of our customers and truly try to make their experience exceptional. Unfortunately I was not there to see what happened first hand but I did get a good update from my office personnel who were there. We have a diverse customer base and strive to make sure everyone is treated with respect and do not treat people differently. If my staff failed to recognize your presence, I apologize.
Respectfully,
Mike Warren
Owner

text: Wonderful experience with friendly customer service.

name: brandon smith
text:
Action collision center needs to rethink their mission statement because they do not offer service in a timely manner.

Mission Statement
Action Collision Center seeks to provide its customers with timely, affordable and effective service in a friendly, professional environment. It is our duty to make sure customers receive outstanding service that is an exceptional value. We will promptly answer any questions about repairs or insurance. We will ensure that each customer drives home completely satisfied.

Our goal is to give you the best service, the highest quality and the most affordable price on collision repair work. Your vehicle will be restored to pre-collision quality or better.

text: Was very stressful dealing with this business.  Let the evidence speak for itsef.  Very shody workmanship and unprofessional. text: I had a severe accident and my insurance adjuster suggested this body shop for repairs.  Since I live over 6 hours away and had no idea about body shops in the area, I trusted the reviews and advice from my insurance adjuster.  This body shop not only took 2 months to complete the repairs, but when I received my vehicle it looked terrible (swirls in the paint, paint runs, things not aligned correctly, dents that hadn't been repaired, a new dent in the fender on the opposite side of the collision, even a gash taken out of the rim they were supposed to have replaced).  I had to take it into a different body shop to have most of the work they completed redone and was without my vehicle from April until mid-July thanks to the horrible work that this body shop did.  I wouldn't recommend anyone to go there.  To top it all off, the owner knew that there were issues with the car and still allowed me to drive over 6 hours to retrieve it.  Unfortunately they botched it up so badly that even the best body shop in my town was unable to completely fix everything and now I'm stuck with a sub-par version of what was a brand new (4 day old) car before they got a hold of it.

text:
I told them to replace a hood but the part they used was twice what they estimated. The labor was also more expensive than they estimated.

They replaced a wiper that I told them not to replace and charged $115. It’s a $20 part and replacing it involves turning a wrench maybe 11 times. They might have had to open a box...who knows.

Additionally they charged me $120 for a diagnostic scan and clearing trouble codes. I own a scan tool and I scanned it prior to dropping it off. There were no trouble codes...none.

Typically insurance would pay for this. I won’t be. This is why insurance is more expensive than it should be.

name: Cole Latham
text:
CAR: brought my car here recently to repair front end damage caused by a collision. The amount they initially quoted me was very close to the final invoice. The car needed front end cosmetics, a new radiator, and the HVAC system needed to be repaired and recharged. I have no complaints as of yet. They seem to have done a great job and the front end looks brand new. They do use pre-owned parts from LKQ but I could care less about that and sometimes it's necessary and saves money on repairs. I also noticed that they washed and cleaned the interior and exterior of my car so that's an added bonus. It almost seems like I was getting into a brand new car when I picked it up!

TIME: I initially took my car to another body shop the day the crash happened but they were booked up for 2 weeks. I asked them for a referral and they sent me to this place. Good decision since they had no wait time and started ordering parts the day they towed my car to their shop. Altogether it was about 1 1/2 weeks from start to finish. I'd rather they take their time and do it right than skip corners.

PEOPLE: The people at this business are extremely nice and talk to you in a pleasant manner, not overbearing at all. They do not try to push anything on you or upsell anything you do not need, Very knowledgeable and professional staff who you can tell have been in the business for a long time.

TLDR: I have had my car back for a few days now and have absolutely no problems as of yet. They said if I do experience any problems with their work to come back and see them and they will make it right. I highly recommend this shop and wouldn't hesitate to bring my car back in the future.

text: I went to the collision center to have my Nissan Altima repaired after an accident. First let me say everyone down at the collision center was so friendly and helpful. Tim explained everything to me about the estimate and what it would take to repair my car. He made sure I understood everything. He also called to inform me when my vehicle would be ready. When I went to pick my car up I was pleasantly surprised by how nice my car looked. The paint match was absolutely perfect. I believe they also detailed my car because it was much cleaner than when I dropped it off. I would definitely recommend this place and I would also recommend Tim he is the collision estimator. Trust me you won’t be disappointed with their service. I know I’m not.

name: Gabrielle Kelly
text: On April 20, I was in a car accident that nearly totaled my car! Since my car was not totaled out, I decided to let Landers McLarty Chevrolet Collision Center do the extensive work to my vehicle. The communication between the collision center and myself has been beyond unsatisfactory. I will say that I am completely understanding in knowing that my car did have a great amount of damage, but my frustration is the poor communication. I have spoken to Jeff on numerous occasions to ask for a status of my vehicle. For instance, I called Jeff on Monday asking about status. He stated he would call me today to let me know if the part that was needed came in and if my vehicle would be ready by Thursday (tomorrow). It is currently Wednesday at approximately 4:00pm, and I have not heard of any update as it relates to my vehicle (they close at 5:30). He often states “I tried to reach out to you” but he never leaves a voice message or anything, and I never seem to have a “missed call.” This is the same type of NON verbal communication I have been getting since my car has been with Landers McLarty Chevrolet Collision Center. All I ask that if you say you are going to call me with an update, DO SO! They give you a call back day, and you won’t hear from them until YOU reach out! A little more effective communication helps in my situation, as I have been without my vehicle for over 2 months! I would like to plan accordingly, as I do work EVERYDAY! Planning accordingly is effective if the communication is effective, which in this case, it is not. I am a very dissatisfied customer! I am now getting ready to call Jeff, AGAIN, because he has not reached out to me, as he stated he would.

name: Toni Edlund
text:
Brought my car to Rettig for some minor body repair and paint. Danielle in the office was very professional and pleasant,  but the manager Mark truly went above and beyond his duty’s.  When I left my Vehicle was driving oddly and nothing like when I brought it to them. The clock, radio, Bluetooth, everything was messed up I brought it back and Mark came out to tell me he would have his diagnostic person run some tests on it the following day. By the time I got home several minutes later the acceleration, transmission,  breaking everything was messing up. I called Rettig again and Mark immediately came to my home to assess what was going on. Turns out it was the battery. A new one was purchased and installed and my car works perfectly. Because there are so many touch screens and electrical things on my car I had no idea. I thought it was very kind and just old-fashioned  professional for him to come to my home and basically tell me what was wrong with my car. I will always use Rettig for all of my vehicle issues and I will highly recommend them to all.
Toni Edlund

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and the opportunity to serve you Ms. Edlund!!

name: Walton R L Taylor
text: Used their services for 24 years on 6 occasions from Bob Allen to Jim Patrick. Top quality work and great people with whom to work. This is THE ONLY PLACE to bring your Porsche or other exotic car. They will work at the same level of quality on your Toyota Corolla. You can get work done at less expense elsewhere. And that is exactly what you will get — less.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Taylor for your continued business over the years! We appreciate you!

name: Jackie Turner
text: I have used Rettig' auto Body for many years for body work.  They are absolutely the best place in the South to get professional work done.  the paint jobs are perfection, the body work is also perfect.  There is never a gap or over spray anywhere on the vehicle.  The care they take to get your vehicle to look as it did before the damage is 100%.  I took my 2018 Murano in on Monday,  Danielle came out took the estimate on the repair work.  She assessed everything down to the decals that had to be replaced.  She was so kind, friendly and helpful.  I put my car in the shop on  Monday and got it back on Friday.  She did an outstanding job speaking with the insurance companies and keeping me informed on everything taking place.  She was top notch with her customer service skills.  Mr. Rettig was also a huge help in making sure I was completely satisfied with my vehicle.  I have referred many family and friends to Rettig's.  I would never take any vehicle to any other shop for body repair work.  I have owned foreign and domestic vehicles, if you want your vehicle put back together correctly and look better than it did before do yourself a favor take it to RETTIG's.

resp.text: Thank you Jackie for your continued business, we appreciate you!!!

text: We had the misfortune over thanksgiving holiday of being  involved in an accident that debilitated our vehicle. It had to be left in Alabama while we made our way back to Texas. It was fortuitous that it was a Subaru and they didn't have a body shop but highly recommended Rettig's. Fred, Jim and others were so helpful.  If you have a vehicle that you want repaired correctly go to Rettig's.  I just got home from the return trip 600 plus miles. The car which required suspension, wheel and other repairs in addition to body work drove wonderfully.  I'm determined now to write positive reviews when good experiences occur.  Most people just gripe and complain and expect their lives to be trouble free even when though they caused the problem.  This was my fault and Rettig's made it right.  Thank you Fred and staff.

resp.text: Hi Eddie, thank you for your wonderful review! We're happy to hear about your positive experience at our Caliber Collision location. Thank you for allowing Caliber to restore you to the rhythm of your life. Have a great day!

name: John Monteleone
text: Absolute best experience! The entire staff was pleasant and very helpful. My vehicle was completed ahead of schedule and was in perfect condition. Damage to your vehicle is a stressful situation but these guys made it a great experience with no issues whatsoever. I highly recommend them!

name: Frank Barrere
text: Great work. Like a quality job it takes time. They are faster than others who less quality work. Great experience.

name: Daniel Watts (Dano)
text: Don't know what all they did but this was less damage than this vehicle sustained in Jan and the work looks like it was done rather quickly and not properly. Now my vehicle is throwing codes when it wasn't and from what i've looked into it should not be throwing these codes unless improper work was done. From what I can tell it looks that way since I am finding exposed wiring so now I will have to see what is wrong from the dealer. I have already contacted my insurance company and let them know. I would have hoped when I went to pick it up they would have fixed the issue since they messed whatever it was up.

name: An Toinette
text:
My experience here was great. The customer service was very professional and knowledgeable. The entire staff worked with me patiently making sure I got the right repairs and they diagnosed the problem so quickly in a timely manner. After picking up my car from the shop I was super satisfied with the quality of repairing & details. I highly recommend everyone to Professional Collision auto body shop for your vehicle maintenances because they’ll go the extra mile for you. I will definitely use their services again. :)

-KaLesha

name: Lakeithy Day
text:
My Camaro has been at this shop for almost  a  month . I call to see if it was ready, cause I haven't heard from anyone. They say oh yea it's ready. We left a message.  I say with whom. (wrong #) So the next day I come to get my car the driver side glass  was still messed up.   They should have looked my car over before saying it was ready. When it clearly was not
😧WOW !! A  month and still no  car 😡

name: JAMELLE S. ROY
text:
No headache, no hassel. The body work and paint guys did an awesome job with repairs, looks brand new. Chasity handled the paperwork details which made dropoff and pick-up a breeze. I got a phone call my car was ready 4 days before projected pick-up time. What an Awesome Team.
Thanks so much!

name: Steven Hardin
text: Everyone was professional, courteous, and a good sense of humor. They took good care of my vehicle. Can not even tell it was damaged. They also completed the job in a timely matter. Will definitely use again.

name: V Wills
text: Professional service and beautiful repair on my car... I would highly recommend them to friends and family. Thank you.

name: Nick Robertson
text: Fast, friendly and on time quality work. The only negative was the smell of auto paint which lingered for over a week inside the car. Not sure what you could do about that though.  Great operation!

name: Carolyn Quinn
text: I was so pleased with the repairs outside the car.  When the door was opened the car was detailed, which it needed.  This was a pleasant experience.

name: Meagan Cain
text: The employees are very welcoming, nice, and professional. They did an outstanding job with my vehicle repair in such a timely manner. I have used them a few times throughout the years and will continue to. I also recommend them to anyone.

name: Dayna Hurst
text: They did an great job and finished ahead of schedule! We would definitely choose them again!

name: Liz Miller
text: This is the second time I have used this location.  The staff is super nice and very helpful.  The work was beautiful and guaranteed with warranties.  I recommend this location to my family and friends.  And if needed I will be back.  Thank you!

name: Sheri C
text: They finished 6 days ahead of schedule, which was awesome. But when I opened my trunk, there was left over trash, and dirty rags. Then as my Mom drove my car home I noticed that the brake light on the rear passenger side was out. By this time its past 5pm and they are closed. I went to auto zone and bought a $10.00 bulb for the back brake light because I didn't want to get a ticket.

name: Lisa Fox
text: I was very pleased with the service from Professional Collision, they did a very good job and in a very timely manner all the servers were courteous

name: Ray Cox
text: I brought the vehicle in and got an estimate, I had scheduled an appointment for ddrop off and did as agreed. Then I got a call from a second estimator informing me that the price has now increased over $300 from my original estimate. Then I was told that the painter was taking time off and I woul have to leave it an extra week. We decided to just bring it back the following week I let them know the urgency of getting the vehicle back on Friday. I got a call telling me that it was going to be done on Tuesday I was not accepting that. They did meet the Friday pick up. The work was excellent no complaints about the finished product. The hours of operation are difficult for working people since they leave at 5 and are not open on Saturday.

name: Stephanie Tashbin
text: I had to bring my car in after a small fender bender. Chasity was extremely helpful and the repairs were done very quickly and my car looks brand new!

text: Before today I would have given a 5 star. I had perfect service on my previous visit two years ago. Today,  I walked in for an estimate.  The young lady stated she would get someone to assist me.  No other customers in building except me, and 4 employees at their desk on cell phones and taking other calls. Another customer walks in, the same young lady stated she would see if someone could assist him, the same young man sitting next to her at his desk jumps up and starts he will assist the guy who just walked in. I sat for 15 minutes and the guy wasnt in there 3 mins and the gentlemen jumps up to assist him. I am very disappointed with how I was treated today.

text: Rushed through the job!!! Left the traction light on and trac sensor button broke. Bumper keeps popping out and locks won’t always open

text: I just got my car back today and so far I am pleased with my vehicle.  Jason was the representative taking car of my vehicle and ge was very pleasant and courteous.

text: They were very friendly with the whole process and I had no problem with anything

name: mcqueen family
text: Impossible to get a call back from their estimator even after several left messages.

name: David Parker
text: I wouldn't take a clunker to Professional, there isn't a thing Professional about them. Took my suburban in for hail damage, and it has been back 3 times and is still there. The job should have taken 6 days it's been 3 weeks. I picked my truck up and the inside was flooded, plastic trim was broke, my tail lights didn't work and I was charged for a new one and it wasn't even replaced, my rear ac didn't work, seat switch was broke, dash was destroyed and they insist it's a factory default but it wasn't in this condition when I dropped it off! My truck had greasy handprints all through out the interior it was awful. now they are only trying to fix the minimum damage and trying to say factory defaults are not included. Well  it wasn't broke when I bought it and it wasn't broke when you got it how is it to be replaced at my expense? I wouldn't recommend them to anyone and my lawyer will be contacting them. They ruined a $34,000 truck!

name: Brian Keyes
text: Did an excellent job with my 2015 FR-S. Paint matched awesome and they were great to work with. Would definitely recommend

name: Brian Keyes
text: Did an excellent job with my 2015 FR-S. Paint matched awesome and they were great to work with. Would definitely recommend

Service was professional quick and everyone involved was extremely polite .  They took great care of us and the wow factor was outstanding.

name: steven schuh
text: Exceptional service from initial assessment to completion of the repairs.  My truck was completed 4 days ahead of schedule.  Thanks

name: Daniel Speese
text:
Update on 10/18/2018:
After my 2015 chevy Sonic was hit I once again went to professional collision. They did great on my minor fender bender with my 2014 Camaro SS so why not my other car, right? Oh boy was I wrong! Since I got my car back I haven't had AC for more than 48 hours total! They recharged it, then replaced a part that was replaced with the initial repair in July 2018 and now after having my car their 2x for rework, I still have no AC in my car! Why you ask? Well according to them it's not their fault all the refrigerant spewed out of the faulty part, which is bad for my AC compressor as it causes it to overheat! Instead it is my fault! Is it? Is it my fault you paid for aftermarket parts and not OEM or is it my fault for not assuming you would use OEM as that's what the car had prior to the accident? Could it be my fault because I brought you my car assuming you could handle it as I expected? I'll let all the people who read this decide! If the owner of this business would like to reach me then they can reply to this or call me as I am sure they have my number. If not then please know that I will never update this as you have lost my business but if you do contact me then I would love to update it with how you replied to a customer who spent $5600 worth of insurance money I cannot get back.

text: I took my car to McGriff Auto after my passenger side doors got hit by another car. They did an amazing job! Even touched up paint on other parts of the car that weren’t caused by the wreck. My car was cleaned inside and out and felt like new! I would highly recommend them.

text: I typically do work on my own vehicle as I am so skeptical of auto shops. When I was unable to do a repair myself I brought my import here. Great people, friendly, knowledgeable, quick service AND affordable! Will come back for any future needs for sure.

They must think I'm a blooming idiot.

When he did tell me what was wrong it was a month later. Then he tried to over charge me. He got mad because i asked for my keys and tried to charge me for my truck sitting on his lot for 2 months when he was supposed to be fixing it!
They are horrible!!! DO NOT TAKE YOUR CAR THERE!!!!!

name: LaMarcus Dofredo Wyatt
text: Brought my truck to be painted 3 weeks ago. 3 full weeks. At drop off i was told 1 and a half weeks it would be done , maybe less. Setback after setback i come in today to talk to them and they are closed in the middle of the operating hours listed on their doors. Not an employee in sight.  There is no reason  to come here at all. Driving your car damaged or with messed up paint is better than not having a car at all which is what i have gotten from here.

name: Anthony Pent
text: They could not figure out how to put flares on our truck.  My 100lb wife did it by self when we got home.  They told us several times it would be done and it wasn't.   Nice guys but they need a manager.

name: Kev Nelson
text:
*ATTENTION* PLEASE READ ALL REVIEWS. I wanted to believe these bad reviews were a result of difficult to please customers but no.

This companies bad reviews are well deserved. STAY AWAY IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR CAR. THEY ARE CHEAP FOR A REASON.

Let me begin with management. The store seems to be ran by two extremely incompetent girls Ashley and April. There were several issues with my car that I did not know about till I called.

They ordered parts for my car without my permission and thought I was gonna pay for it. Think again! They refused to give a contact for the franchise owner.

Only after I threatened file a police report they called and told me to get my car. Half done, half out painted. Car looks far worse than when it went in.

Ashley the so-called manager was especially snotty. I asked for a specific paint they agreed then used oem as if I wouldn't notice. Bottom line I'm far from done with joke of a company. I will be filling suit for damages.

I don't know why anyone would leave a business to 2 stupid girls they must be family.

name: olivia hammond
text: Highly in professional and on organized. Not worth the discount. Would go out of town to have my car looked at before I'll put it in the hands of these people.

name: Nick Hegler
text: Customer service was fine but quality and workmanship was horrible. Received my truck back with more dents than before and it was clearly not wetsanded or anything after it was painted. They didn't even remove the glue residue from where the rain guards were. They just painted over it. This place is a joke when it comes to painting a car. I now have to find another shop that can fix their awful job.

name: D Morgan
text: Quality and standards do not exist here.  Staff lacks leadership and skills.  Worst body work I ever seen even on brand new body parts.  Brought a shiny car and left with a dull one thanks to the premium BC/CC package.  Entire staff needs drug screening!   Im a contractor and dealer and I wouldn't dare refer someone for this kind of business.  Thanks Brandon.

resp.text:
We have somehow missed this review and hope we can try to make it up to you. We have a completely new team in place and invite you to come back in and take advantage of the warranty in place for your work. Please contact Krystal the new manager and she will help you.

Thank you

resp.text: Ms. Lemus, we can not find your name in our system anywhere. Are you sure you have the correct location? We are unaware of anyone with a truck who recently has been into our shop and left unhappy. Please call the shop or Maaco Customer Service to express your concerns.

Seemed sketchy just to give someone a price and not put it down in writing. I asked him to give me a call the following Monday as I was still interested in doing business with him but that I was going to do some other shopping around at other body shops in the area. He took down my name and number. Never heard from the guy. That was six weeks ago.

text: They do a great job at terrific prices. They go out of there way got customers. They even delivered our car to our home. They work with you. I have had allot of cars that needed to have worked on over the years of my life and I believe this is the best place I have ever used. That is saying allot.

name: Matt Forehand
text: Plaza Body Works is a Collision Repair Facility.  We do not usually do all over paint jobs. Sorry for any misunderstanding.

name: Ernest Knepp
text: I got a warning light to check my charging system and then a warning I had a low battery. I was driving home from Alabama to Indiana and spotted this automotive shop. I pulled in and a guy came out right away and asked me what was going on. I told him, he said pop the hood. I explained I was trying to get home (On a Friday afternoon). He found the problem, called and got a new alternator belt delivered, He installed it and I was good to go in 45 minutes. (Had to wait on the part). Charged me $65.00 - I gave him $80.00, shook his hand and thanked him profusely. What a great experience.

name: Ty Burt
text: Regency is leagues ahead of every single body shop I've ever taken a car to in my lifetime. They will go out of their way to do everything first-class and provide you with the best customer service in the state. Ed Bullard and his staff also pointed out older techniques used on my car by a previous body shop. He explained the new techniques they were using at his shop and had my car back to me in a matter of days.

name: Nazim Raza
text: We are from Atlanta and visiting some friends in Houston. I parked my car in the shopping center and someone hit my car and damaged the front bumper and hood. I took my car to Regency Body Shop for repair. The owner was very helpful and made it a priority to get our car fixed. We had our car bumper replaced and front hood damage fixed the same day. The auto body mechanics were very professional and I will never forget the kindness shown to us. The repair cost was far less than I had expected. Excellent work, highly recommended.

name: brad crosslin
text: Regency did an exceptional job with my fiance's car. The quality of the work is perfect and the customer service they provided was second to none. 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a body shop.

name: Lillian Borden
text: 10/10 would recommend!

name: Charles Swindle
text: Thanks to Ed and the great people there we are going again. No insurance hassle they handled it all. To my surprise they even washed and cleaned the inside. This is the ONLY place to go in Florence.

resp.text: Thanks for the stars and your review, Charles! We're here anytime you need us. - Ed B., Owner

text: The service is outstanding and the employees are so concerned about your satisfaction. Great place to go for auto body repair.

resp.text: Bennie, we truly appreciate your support! We're always happy to lend a hand, so don't hesitate to let us know if you need us. Wishing you all the best! -Ed B., Owner

text: Stolen wallet from my vehicle no response from owner wallet had sentimental value they could keep $500.00 a gift given to me from my wife of 27 years. name: Tyler Heinrichs
text:
READ BEFORE GOING TO B.Y.O.P BIRMINGHAM

When I picked up my Jeep Wrangler I paid $1200 and they said they test drove it and it was all good. As soon as I drove it away it had about 5 inches of travel in the steering wheel so I couldn't control it.
Both of my dust covers were not bolted on and were rattling and spinning, if they actual test drove it they would have noticed. Also the "alignment" they did was terrible, both front wheels were facing opposite directions and causing my trac sensors to read that I had no traction. (mind they did say couldn't get it "perfect" but for it to not even be able to drive it off the lot, that is unacceptable)
I brought it back instantly and they said they could hear the rattling when I pulled up, again if they ACTUALLY TEST DROVE it they would have noticed. They took it back and put 1 dust cover on and didn't check the other because after I left the same sound came from the other side. The second alignment that they did was just one of there guys under the jeep doing an alignment, no machine, I did not see any kind of alignment system on my Jeep the whole time.
When they finished the manager came over and said "like I said before, our alignment system couldn't get it right." WHAT ALIGNMENT SYSTEM??? YOUR MACHANICS EYES?
After all of that the only thing they worked with me on price was that they didn't charge me for the alignment. But $1200 worth of work and I am still having to take it somewhere else to get it aligned and to double check all there terrible work.

I will never be going back and I will tell everyone to never go to B.Y.O.P Birmingham.

I talk to shepherd and he said “ Listen here my mechanics don’t need your money “ ok well it’s gone be this REVIEW FOR ME with that being said the work was good they are just the THIEVES so Please lock car and don’t Trust them Learning Experience ❣️

name: Jermaine Hall
text: First I want to say I'm a huge supporter of black owned businesses, every opportunity I have to support my people I do. I went to get my breaks replaced. After getting them done I keep hearing a knocking sound. I took it back to the shop and the said they fixed it. After leaving that day I immediately began to hear the knocking sound again. This time I looked for the issue myself and notice the installers failed to put the pin that holds the caliper brackets to the rotors which was causing the entire caliber and braket to slide back and fourth. I took it back again and it seemed to be a pin in place. About a week later I started to hear a grinding noise so at this point I didnt trust the management or installers so I took it to another shop to have a brake inspection. They found were another pin was also missing and this was causing my breaks to slide. I was told before hand to not do business at byop by multiple people but I decide to go anyway. My recommendation to anyone else considering taking your car to this shop is it's not worth it. The price is possibly going to be cheaper but the installers are untrustworthy. If you interact with the owner and his wife they come across as God fearing wholesome grandparents that care about you but they really just want your money. I could have been seriously injured because of the this and after telling them about it they stood by the work of their installers. This is a side note, not all but a few of the installers definitely currently do drugs or did drugs which should tell you even more about how reputable this business is. SPEND A LITTLE MORE MONEY AND FEEL COMFORTABLE KNOWING THE WORK WAS DONE CORRECTLY!!!! I will never do business with them again unfortunately.

name: Shannon Fischer
text:
Edited to add. (May 29' 2019) The bed literally started coming off. One of the bolts was cross threaded and the other was not put on tightly. The bed of the truck was hopping up and down. Finally a week later it has been cleared to drive and put back together. I would NOT recommend this shop to anyone.

Our truck had some descent side damage. We had gotten an estimate done then filed it through insurance. We liked Madison collison the best out of the shops we had an estimate done with. Called and set our appt. The appt was set for about a week out. We dropped the truck off April 3rd right as they opened. The staff there is very friendly and we didnt assume we would have an issue. They ladies up front took our name, Key and said we will call you when its done. No explination on the process or anything. I called back later to ask how the door would be repaired and was told the finish date was expected to be april 16th and was told someone would call me back with how the door would be repaired. I never heard back. I didnt want to be that client so I just let it slide. I called on the 16th to get an update. They had not even started on our truck. The reasoning was they were behind. Had some high dollar repairs that were taking longer than expected... Ok but why keep our truck for 2 weeks if you werent even working on it?? We should have just gone and gotten our truck and took it elsewhere. They were very apologetic and came back with we will have it done Friday. I said theres no need to use all your man power to rush it. We arent difficult people I just wish you would have kept us informed. We picked it up Friday the 19th and they had forgotten to do the repair on the tailgate. So they kept the tailgate with the promise of calling me the following Tuesday with an update. They didnt call. I called them Wednesday because now the warning light for the gas cap had been on since Saturday (the day after we picked it up) and the check engine light was on. Set an appt for the following day. April 25th. Thank goodness they have a tv in the waiting room and let kids watch what they want. We were there for over 2 hours. The owner came out telling me they had to dig around under the bed and reconnect a sensor wire that controls the air in the tank. Which is why the gas cap light and check engine light came on. Would have been a simple hook up had they not been rushing the repair but they missed it. Fast forward to 6 days later the truck died on the side of the road while my husband was on his way to work. The fuel pump literally fell off!! 2+ hours of them digging around under the bed because they hurried through the repairs. Absolutely no mechanical problems from his truck and now several issues. I called to speak with the owner at 10:30 may 2nd and still have not heard back from him. I cant say that they do great repairs because we have already had issues. Visually the repairs look great. And the staff is very friendly but they dont have any communication skills and cant seem to call people back. Because of the issues weve had we wouldnt reccomend them to anyone and we will not be going back for any further issues. Thankfully they are on State Farms preffered list so the repairs are backed by them and any new issues that come up we can take the truck to another shop.

They communicate openly if there are issues or the schedule needs to be adjusted..they are friendly and priced fairly and they will work around your needs and wants. These guys take care of you like family!! I'll be doing all my auto body work through here from now on.

text: Prompt, upfront service at a fair price!  I needed the roof repainted on my 2006 Tacoma.  They did a nice job and delivered it back ahead of their promised time.  I want my headlights replaced and I'm going back to them for sure.  They are good guys.

text: Quick and beautiful repair. Very pleased with the results and service I received.

resp.text: Thank you for your review

name: Sarah Garden
text: I want to commend Madison Collision Center Plus for the work they completed on my 2013 Nissan Altima. I needed the front bumper replaced along with the headlight and turn signal assemblies. Their work is guaranteed and they also look to find cheaper comparable parts to help with the price. They quoted me 3-4 days to complete my car. They called me within 24 hours to let me know my car was ready. Great people and great company. Thank you to all who helped make my car beautiful again.

text:
Cant begin to say how great this place is! Took my 08 GT in for some fender repair and also my Custom Chopper frame to strip and paint. They wasted no time even over the holidays to get my car fixed up like new! Highly recommend this business for all your car body work and paint needs. Reasonably priced even when doing non-insured work.!  I will be sending more work your way whenever I can.
Thank you Eric and all your  staff for the excellent work!

name: Jacob Freed
text: Did a good job of repairing my car but took more than twice as long as the estimated date of repair.

name: Chuck Eberle
text: I have used Harvest Body Shop/ Madison Collision Center for over twenty years. They have performed body work, finish preparation for show & driver quality paint for several of my classic cars, (66 Mustang, 70 GTO & Dodge Challenger). They have also provided claim services and personal modification to my 2011 Dodge Charger and my 2013 Challenger. For collision services I go to them first, because I know I will get quality results at an affordable price. I have also referred many friends to their shop who have been more then satisfied. Keep up the excellent work guys. Still a customer, Chuck E.

name: Adam Needle
text: Good place to rent a uhaul

name: Cindi Sue Stewart
text: Fine folks, fine repair on my vehicle. I would recommend them to my famy and friends.

name: Dave Bryan
text: I have had a lot of body-customer work done at Madison Collision Center and it's been nothing but excellent work, communication and post-work great support..........in fact, Eric (owner) has persn nally met me over and beyond outside standard hours to get work done or finalize car work so i could meet a timeline when needed, which is WAY over and beyond the standard service requirement. Their communication on status of car and quotes on additional work is so responsive, which is so huge to me for planning real-time car work, etc. I have gone back many times and will continue to, and tell all friends needing body work/painting/etc about Madison Collision Center.

name: Jonathan LaRue
text: I have been going to Madison Collision Center for about 4 years. Ever since I met my wife. (She's not the best driver) I have had my 2007 Chevy LTZ Avalance, 2014 Lexus IS 350 F-Sport and a 2005 Hummer all repaired by this shop. Eric, the owner is very intelligent when it comes to vehicles of any make or model. This is absolutely the only place that will touch any of my vehicles. Turn around time is on average to other similar businesses and on occasion...they get me in rather quick because of my neediness of my vehicles. On top of all of that. This is a local family owned and operated business and will treat you like family. I have, on various occasions, called Eric and he came to my house to help me install (I tried to do it myself and- failed) a custom headlight system and he didn't even charge me. Like I said, this is the ONLY place that will touch my rides and...if anyone has ever asked about a repair shop...I've sent them to "MY GUYS" because that's what they are. These are my guys I trust with my rides.

resp.text: We give receipts for every transaction made through our shop. We also keep a detailed log in our system of every repair made and estimate made even if the repair was not done. Our system does not delete any transactions at any time even if it has been years since the repair was done! We also give a lifetime guarantee on all repairs and paint unless otherwise noted prior to the repair. The only way we do not give a guarantee is if the customer supplies parts that we would not normally use or if the customer states that they only want to job do a certain way and this is not a standard practice. Everything is noted and explained to the customer prior to repairs if any of these issues would arise. But on a normal basis there is always a lifetime guarantee on all of our work! And if any customer has an issue please contact us and we can get it fixed!

name: Cecillynn Shields
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. Worst experience EVER. They have had my car for over a week doing recall work to it. They have no concept of time. I have been given 3 different times of when my car was supposed to be ready and it STILL is not ready. This is NOT my first bad experience with them, but I decided to give them the benefit of the doubt and give them another try. MY MISTAKE. They should not even be in the customer service business. Lack of communication between the workers is ridiculous. My car could be on fire and I would NEVER bring it here again.

name: renea waller
text: I took my Ford Explorer in for service today scheduled appointment might I add for a oil change and for them to check my back up camera and to please call me before he did anything to the camera and let me know how much it would cost me. I expressed this 3 times to him and he said no problem. Got a call from him and he informed me that the had filed a claim with my insurance and that it was going to cost me 400.00 plus the oil change, I told him NO! I just wanted to get a estimate and that I was not going to pay for the camera being fix right now, he was not happy and said he would get my car ready and I could come pick it up. I then ask did they even change my oil and he said,"oh not yet". They had my car from 7:00 A.M. scheduled appointment until 6:36 P.M. needless to say I had to call to see if it was even ready yet. He said," yes", and I ask for a total of my bill he states he needed to do another ticket but it would be around 150, no more. I get there and they have charged me 175.26 (WOW)! for a oil change and to look at my camera to tell me it needed to be replaced. Then I also noticed they decided to donate 2.00 of that to drive pink. I called to complain but of course it didn't matter, was told they did want to lose my business well guess what you have. It's a shame as a woman you can't go by yourself to get your car taken care of without men taking advantage of you. Well you might want to think twice before going there. My advice to you is to it to ask for Brandon, because when I called back to complain he was very helpful. And thanks for my courtesy vacuum and wash that I did not receive but was told ALL OUR CUSTOMERS RECEIVE THAT!!!!

name: Raj kumar
text: I've never had such a Bad experience from car service center , I was called for air bag recall , when I brought it in they made me feel like they are doing me a favour ,they changed my delivery time four times I had to take two days off work , they ignore you at the front desk and are very rude over the phone.They  asked my friend Who accompanied me to the service center to leave while she was waiting in the lobby cause it was a cold evening, finially when I got my car ,I asked for the paper work for which they were reluctant to give and then when  I go see my car it had food leftovers  and bottle caps in the front seat  it looked like someone ate in there ,the back seat had come off which didn't  any sense when it was a air bag recall , this is the  worst place to get your car serviced they don't care about coustomer's safety forget satisfaction. Wish I could give zero stars.

text: They are very slow and cause more damage than that they fixed. Had you take my car back because they damaged my window and forgot to put parts back after removing them and rework the pinstripe that was put on with paper still under it. After dropping the car off a second time precision held it over night because they were unprepared to fix the window even with a weeks notice all without telling me I would be without the car another day

resp.text: Jacob, we are sorry that it was just about impossible to make you happy. We finished the repair work to your vehicle in the repair time frame. We also took it upon ourselves to help you, the college student,  with the financial side of this and we didn't have to do so. That was money out of our pocket. Also the "rattle" you kept complaining about in your door was pocket change that you had left in your door pocket. There were no parts that Precision forget to put back in your car. We apologized for the faulty pin stripe and took care of it. We also took care of a scratch on your window tint that was not wreck related or any fault of ours. We also didn't HOLD your car over night. I personally made the phone call to notify you to pick up your vehicle and you didn't answer. Again we apologize for any inconvenience this may have cause you. Thank You.

name: Judy J. Wentworth
text: Had collision damage on my passenger side fender and this shop got it fixed like nothing happened. If you go in, ask for Ray. He really helped me out on the quote without any sugarcoating or up selling, he also gave me the best pricing compared to the other shops I visited. Ray got me in and out quick and got my car back to normal for an affordable price. This shop focuses on attention to detail and they make sure you're car is fixed right.

name: John Huff
text: Quality work and great customer service! I took two of my cars here recently and worked with Aaron. Both cars were repaired quickly and done very well. Aaron was great to work with and very patient in explaining how the process works and in keeping me informed regularly on the progress of the repair. Both cars were returned to me washed and vacuumed and looking like new! I highly recommend Advanced Collision.

name: John Williams
text: This place is GREAT! The guys are really nice and they did an awesome job on my car. I went to many auto body shops to get quotes and this was the best. I will def go back. Thanks guys!

text: They are great! They got my car looking like new! I've came here before and they always do an awesome job! I will definitely be coming back if I ever need them!

name: Donna Davis
text: Aaron was very patient and took the time to explain every step of the process for me. He went above and beyond taking care of me, even helping hold my car when I was having some financial problems and couldn't pay for 3 days after my car was ready. When I got my car it was better than I even expected and I was extremely pleased.

name: Michael Allen
text: I was here last week to pick up my Van, couldn't thank enough the crew, especially Mike ,this is a very good shop, I wish them all the best, they fix my van in a timely manner, quality work!! Mike is very sincere and honest that I genuinely believe.

name: Schmidt Berna
text: They do their job beautifully and they go the extra mile. My car hasn't looked this nice and shiny for years, and I never thought I'd feel so happy coming out of a body shop!

name: Me
text: Repair physically

name: Tanycia Philon
text: I brought my 2010 BMW 530i in to have it serviced; might I add I’ve used them numerous times.  I’ve never had a problem with them before.  I received a call saying my cylinder was not performing, and I could come get it because it would need a new motor running me roughly $3k-$4k.  Mind you the guy that helped me was very rude; I asked him what are my options and he said junk it because that’s what I have.  Fast forward twelve months later I  sold the car to a male friend; he had it towed back to Mike & Mike under his name and they replaced the battery and a few minor things for $700.  Ladies please don’t let this happen to you. This was absolutely unbelievable and I really enjoyed how quickly they use to fix my car and get it back to me.  I was truly taken advantage of and lost a good car.

name: Jay Hester
text: If you have a Volkswagen, Mike and Mike's is the place to take it for any repairs. They are extremely knowledgeable and friendly. Gary talked with the warranty company and we had our bug back sooner than expected! I highly recommend them!

name: Queen
text: Very welcoming. I loved the experience. I honestly haven’t taken care of my car in so long and just moved to the area. They took care of it like back home. Will be a regular from now on.

name: Tristen Blackwood
text: If I could give them a 0 I would I have taken my car to them 5 times I have spent $6000 roughly and still haven't got my car fixed plus it's making new noises. Clutch kit was installed wrong writhed on 4v time and still not right

name: Bethany
text: Steer clear if at all possible. Not a good experience. Paid $200 even though couldn’t fix or diagnose problem after a few weeks. We paid though so we could get our car and didn't argue. We go to pick it up and even though drove the car in, was not able to drive it out. Towed to dealership who then fixed it in a day for $140 and has been driving great ever since. The scary part was Mike and TJ were trying to get it back to their shop from dealership so they could have it in their possession once again and up charge us even though we had already paid them once. Fortunately we paid dealership who fixed it and got it back ourselves before they could. Dealership just shook their heads when they heard what was happening. We felt we shouldn’t have to pay Mike’s towing company since our car was no longer drivable after being in their possession and that also upset them.

name: Ron Ross
text: Repairs done fast and at a reasonable price.

name: Corey Eddins
text: Had a full tank of gas when I dropped my car off for repair. When I picked my car up after they were "Finished", my gas tank was almost on Empty. Plus they tried to charge me $600.00 just to put a Mercedes car battery in. I took my car to an actual Mercedes shop and they only charged me $200.00. I thought these people at Mike and mike's were good people, but nope🥀.

name: Angel
text: This is my first time at Mike & Mike's and I am so glad I found this place! The google maps directions took me to the wrong place but when I called, they were very friendly and helped to get me where I needed to be. Mike's prices are fair, the mechanic, TJ was very nice, and they are quick to offer less expensive options for repairs if a replacement is not necessary. Will definitely be coming back for future car care and maintenance!

name: Joseph Traffanstedt
text: They are a good auto shop. Quality work, reasonably fast, and friendly. Had 3 repairs done there so far. Each time work was done in 2 days and fixed properly. Seem to be really honest and good people.

name: Rod Johnson
text: Reached out to get quote regarding fixing my Ford 150 exhaust. I advised someone will contact me back but haven't heard anything since then. Thats been over 3 weeks

name: Shantrice Hadley
text: Great Customer Service and always willing to help!!

name: Busta Smith
text: I called a day before and explained i may have an exhaust leak and would like to make an appointment to fix it. They were nice and said they can look at it. Told me they're usually not swamped and just bring it in any time the next day. I show up the next day and they tell me immediately that they can't work on my car (without even looking at it or asking what car i have) because they don't work on exhausts. But their website claims they're experts and they specialize in German cars. Can't really specialize in something if you're not able to fix exhausts?  I don't know if seeing me in person, not the car, has anything to do with the service (or lack of) I was provided.

name: John Allen Dees
text: Honest, fair, polite, and quick turnaround.  Can’t ask more from an auto service center. Highly recommend.

text: Awesome service. Priced right and quick.

text: I found Mike& Mikes by doing a Google map search, which will go down as one of my best finds via google maps EVER. M&Ms fixed an ongoing issue i had for months & was around $150 cheaper from other shops around the area.  Thanks for taking car of my car...

text: The absolute best experience you will have with a mechanic. Mike and his staff are extremely knowledgeable, while being fair with his pricing. I am a New Yorker, but have known Mike for at least 10 years, and I would not let anyone else touch my 2006 Volkswagen Passat except Mike. For me and my car, Mike & Mike is the best mechanic in Birmingham. (no, I am not, a paid reviewer.

name: Foster David
text: These guys are nothing short of the best.

text: Mike and Mike's is where I will always take my vehicles.  They do a great job and get us in and out of there typically in the same day.  Very knowledgeable staff that are factory certified to work on BMW, Mercedes, Volkswagen and Audi.  They work on domestic too but very satisfied with the work they've done for us.

name: S Underwood
text: I called very upset when my car wouldn’t go into gear and I was stranded an hour and a half away from home. The gentlemen was very kind over the phone and sent someone to help me. The mechanic that came to help was very nice and honest. He explained the problem, got me calmed down, and back on the road.

name: Dean Ethridge
text: Mike and Mike's is where I will always take my vehicles.  They do a great job and get us in and out of there typically in the same day. I contacted Mike and Mike's they had me bring it in to them (did I mention that this was a Friday?) the diagnosed the problem, ordered new parts, negotiated with my extend warranty provider, made my brother and I feel confortable waiting in the shop and, had my repairs done before 5:00pm. I have since spoken with people that have used them for repairs and all I've heard is great things about them.

Thanks for the great work guys

name: Nancy Carr
text:
Knight has fixed multiple issues we have had with vehicles. Wrecks, painting etc,  they do great work
Hpwever, I need documentation from them to get reimbursed by Toyota for painting my RAV4 when the paint peeled off, and Knight is not cooperating   Dropped off the information from Toyota 2 weeks ago.  I need a letter from them on company letterhead on why I brought the car in, what work was done, mileage on the car etc.  all I get from them is crickets. I once gave them 5 stars because they do great work, but I have lost faith in them.   I paid over $1,000.00 for this repainting, and I would like to get my money back from Toyota, but Knight is preventing this from happening.

text: Fast turn around, cheap price considering the quality of the work.

name: Kayla clemmons
text: I had a wreck back in the first week of January this year. My car was sent to Knight Paint and Body the following week. The wreck consisted of the front bumper being dented and the passenger tire being bent. Also, there was a lot of underbody damage. I called to check on the status of my car each week for FIVE MONTHS. Each time I spoke with Mr. Knight he told me something different. Each time he said, “I’m working on it”. I ended up having to get someone to drive me up to the shop. I asked to see my car and to see the so called “Progress” that Mr. Knight had been “working on”. My car….had not been worked on AT ALL! He claimed he had painted the front bumper months ago. The bumper had ABSOLUTLY NOT BEEN PAINTED AND WAS NOT ATTACHED. It was still cracked from the wreck. I ended up having to tow my car in PIECES to another shop called Varner’s Factory which is also located in Bessemer. Upon inspection Henry, a mechanic at Varner’s, noticed more significant damage to my vehicle. One thing in particular was the headlight on the passenger side. It was broken from where Knight ripped it off getting the bumper off. Henry, had to call and get another claims adjuster to come out and reassess the damage which was overlooked the first time. Thankfully, Henry had my car fixed in ONE month!!!! Henry, called me several times with updates weekly on how the repairs were coming. I HIGHLY RECAMEND VARNER’S FACTORY IN BESSEMER. DO NOT TAKE YOUR VEHICLE TO KNIGHT PAINT AND BODY! After a grand total of SIX MONTHS, I had my car back. No more bumming rides off people to go to work. Thankfully, I didn’t get a rental car because that would have been a fortune!

name: E. Y. Rodgers
text: I have used the services of this company twice and I was satisfied each time. The prices are great and the work superb. I  give them my business everytime.

name: Lauren S
text: Absolutely outstanding work and customer service! Prices are very reasonable too!

name: Tracy West s
text: I was sideswiped by a big Wrecker who eased over into my lane between Hueytown and Bessemer. Mr. Knight took a buffer and buffed out the worst paint damage for free. I have friends who have used the Knights and if I have the unfortunate need for any car body repair, I will use this company absolutely! I know this family personally and they will treat you right!

text: Excellent work

text:

Highly Recommended!

text: I had a brand new polyurethane bumper painted here in March, and now, 6 months later, the paint is starting to flake off pretty severely. A few of my friends had similar incidents and they told me that Knight will fix it for free, but I don't feel like it should have happened in the first place.

name: Kent Griggs
text: Did a satisfactory job but did not meet agreed finish date.  Communication was difficult, very difficult. Service manager fired and rehired during the process. Tough customer service.

name: john youngblood
text: Josh at Chapman's P&B did an outstanding job with a repaint of my C7 Corvette rear spoiler.  Better than a factory job at a reasonable price.  A++++.

name: Jana Gallahar
text: Very nice ppl and very helpful and clean

name: Denisa Peacock
text:
They cut my weather stripping around my back door window, pin stripe bubbled up, put clear coat on way to heavy leaving heavy sags, left behind tape marks, things were missing from my truck, change in the my coin holder, my cell phone cord and a 60.00 power washing tip.
He accused me of looking at my truck through a micoscope, and kept bragging all the cars he has did that cost way more then my 2016 Silverado.
Mike Chapman is no longer running this shop.

name: James and Stacee Collier
text: We were supposed to have our car back in 3 days but when my wife went to pick it up the paint job had smears where the paint was put on thick and then touch before it was dry all the way through so she told a lady there that she wasn't happy and they agreed to fix the problem. It was promised to be done in 1 to 2 additional days but was not done and the excuse was the weather. At this point the insurance company doesn't want to pay for a rental anymore because it has been a couple days longer than the estimate given. So now six days have gone by and my wife has been lied to about the progress by a lady that works there multiple times and she knows this because she has to drive by for work every day and can see that the bumper isn't put on yet. On the 7th or 8th day I'm not really sure which they call and say it's done. My wife goes to pick it up and noticed runs in the clear coat but in their defense they told her she could bring it back and they'll even pay for the rental car while they fix it. We won't be bringing it back to them even if they say it's free. They quoted one price the knocked some off because of the bad job and the time it was taking only to raise the price when she went to pick it up. Maybe if they were actually considerate they would have offered to pay for the additional 4 days on the rental we had to pay for because they couldn't paint a damn bumper in 3 days like the quote said. We will not be using them again. I guess they had the cheapest quote for a reason

resp.text:
James, we apologize that the service took longer than we anticipated during this paint job -- unfortunately, the weather does affect our ability to perform our duties. It makes us sad to hear that you were unsatisfied with our efforts to remedy the situation, but if you'd like to bring your vehicle back for a final fix, we're always here for you. If you'd like to discuss these issues further, we'd love to see if we can come to an agreement on how to move forward. (251) 653-1565

Thanks for your time,
Mike C., Owner

name: Kimberly Wildebrandt
text: So far Awesome and very helpful I haven't got my vehicle fixed yet but will be ready by end of this week so I will know by then how they really are (their work/business)

resp.text: Kimberly, thanks for this review! We'll have your vehicle ready and back to you in no time. Looking forward to seeing you here soon. -Mike C., Owner
